Such fast hands from Dhoni. Kohli and AB gone in two overs. Harbhajan tosses up an offbreak on middle, turns in, AB stretches out for a reverse-sweep but still can't meet the pitch of the ball. He sweeps and misses. Dhoni doesn't miss the ball, rides the bounce, and flips the bails off in a flash

Harbhajan drops a return catch! Tossed outside off, hint of turn, Parthiv does not meet the pitch and drives. Instead, he chips it in the air to the right of the bowler. Harbhajan is late to react in his followthrough. The ball bursts through
flatter and quicker just outside off, AB stretches out for the sweep and collects thin air. But the impact is outside the line of off

Jadeja strikes with his first ball and bowls Kohli. Arm ball arrows in from around the stumps, no turn, Kohli looks to chop it away from off stump. No dice. Jadeja knocks over the off stump and is almost apologetic in celebration
Parthiv jumps outside leg, Ngidi goes full and wide, beaten on the outside edge again
now it's Parthiv's turn to use his feet, Thakur keeps digging the ball into the middle of the pitch. Parthiv aims a pull, ends up flapping the ball over midwicket
banged in short on off again, Kohli takes a step forward, the ball gets big on him, fended off to the leg side for one
Kohli steps out again, Thakur hits the pitch hard and goes shorter, 139.9ks, jabbed back to the bowler
Kohli marches down the track again, meets a back-of-a-length ball outside off, and crunches it over Thakur's head. Pinged off the middle of the bat to the straight boundary
back of a length and angling in, Kohli uses his feet and turns it to leg side
Ngidi beats the outside edge again! Parthiv uses his feet and swings hard so much so he loses his shape. Throws his bat at the ball and misses
very full and angling in, Kohli misses the flick, deflected off the thigh pad for one
Willey hits a hard length on off, cramps up Kohli, who drags a pull to deep square leg off the inside half
good length and holds its line on off, stretches out and pushes it back to Willey
back of a length and running away outside off again, Kohli angles it down to a floating slip and secures a quick single
pitched up and angling across off, Kohli shimmies out and drives to mid-on
Ngidi goes very full on off stump, 141.5ks, Parthiv picks it up and simply chips it in the air over midwicket for back-to-back fours

The returning Thakur juggles, and clings onto the overhead catch at mid-on. Baz forays down the track, Ngidi bowls a back-of-a-length offcutter outside off. The batsman has to reach out for the ball, he loses his shape, and ends up slicing the ball in the air off the toe end. Thakur hangs onto it on the rebound
Baz darts around in the crease and throws Ngidi off his line. Back of a length and slanted down leg, leg-side wide
Willey goes shorter and just a shade outside off, McCullum leans back and glides it in the gap between backward point and short third man for four

Willey draws an appeal for lbw on debut. Not given. CSK don't review it either. Good length and skidding back in, Parthiv hops, plays around his front pad, and does not make contact again. Height may have been an issue
all done! Leg byes for four. Mumbai win with an over to spare. A yorker outside off, Krunal gets outside the line and misses a slog. The ball ricochets off the shoe to the third man boundary.
definitely done now. Length on off., Krunal launches a slog into the stands at deep midwicket. Defending at this ground is so hard.
four more. A slower delivery outside off, Krunal was well and truly beaten by that delivery, but he improvised so well. Waited and waited and then carved the ball in the air, but past point.
that's the game done! That was an awful delivery, on middle and leg. Krunal backs away and slogs the ball with ease over long-on. 20 runs off that over, and Mumbai should have no trouble from here.
powered past cover for four more. A slower ball outside off, Krunal clears his front leg and clatters a powerful drive through cover
finishes the over with six! A dart on the pads from Mujeeb, Rohit runs at him with immense self-confidence and flicks him over midwicket for six. All timing, fantastic stroke-making
oh lovely timing from Krunal. Full on middle and leg, he just flicked that in the gap. His strong wrists and gap placement earns him four.

127 kph, goes through Hardik! It's a slower ball on middle, think he disguised that ball excellently. Because Pandya saw the length, picked the right shot (a wild T20 heave, what else?) but was through his shot too early. The ball then had an unhindered path to the middle stump. Lovely execution.

the swervy knuckle ball does the trick for Stoinis. A length knuckle ball outside off, the ball moves away. Suryakumar swings across the line but the ball takes the leading edge and lobs towards Rahul. He swerves into position and takes the swirler. Excellent bowling
back of a length outside off, and gets into Yadav's body. Hits his gut as he tries to defend
Rahul holds on! Short outside off, but going straight. Lewis tried to cut, but he hits it straight into Rahul's open gloves. Excellent take
yorker wide outside off, and Lewis chops it towards short third man
slow outside off, another punch from the back foot. This is to wide long-off, and two. Breaks the single sequence off Ashwin
skiddy. Some swing too. Good length outside off, the ball moving in. Lewis chops a punch into the ground, towards gully
tossed up outside off, defended towards cover. Lewis labours to the other end, but makes his ground despite a direct hit.
six! 133 kph, a short delivery around off, Stoinis backs away and slices the ball intentionally over short third man. Not the worst delivery, but that's a very good shot.

good catch. A slower ball outside off, Agarwal backs away. The ball is wide outside off, so he isn't balanced at point of contact. The ball slices away, third man runs back and takes a good, well-judged catch
a short slower ball outside off, hit away to long-off. Stoinis isn't happy with the execution.
seven off the first ball. Full outside off, Stoinis gets underneath the length and gets enough to clear long-off. Not the best of timing, but enough
back of a length, short delivery. Stoinis splices a pull with awful timing towards long-on for two.
a slower delivery outside off. Stoinis tries to lift the ball over cover but plays weirdly inside the line. Stoinis now 4 off 7
just over long-off. A slower ball again outside off, Agarwal looks to hit the ball over cover but the bat face closes again. He still has just enough timing and power to clear long-off
back of a length outside off, Stoinis is hurried on the pull, hits it back towards the bowler, who misfields. One to long-off

chipped to Hardik Pandya at long-on! Kings XI stuttering here. Another good slower ball, on middle and leg, an offcutter. Axar Patel tries to hit the ball straight and does so well. But the pace off the ball was responsible for the ball being chipped instead of hit. Easy catch.
a low full toss down leg, Axar misses a flick, struck on the pad. Bumrah appeals, but no says the umpire. One leg bye towards midwicket
back of a length on off, 136 kph. Stoinis blocks back.

taken at long-off. A slower ball around off, Karun Nair looks to loft that over cover but he doesn't quite hit the ball well enough. The bat turns in his hands and the ball takes the inside half. Lobs to Hardik Pandya, running around to his left from long-off.

McClenaghan misses! A massive chance, he should be hitting the stumps from there. Good length on off, a thick inside edge ricochets to cover via the pad. Nair runs down and is sent back. McClenaghan takes aim and misses at the bowler's end
way into the stands again. A short delivery, back of a length on off. Nair shuffles across, gets inside the line and swivels into a pull to deep square leg. Too easy again.
the googly down leg. Nair works it down to fine leg. Would have been wide had he left the ball.
swatted for six more. Another slower delivery, may have been the legcutter. Nair goes back and pulls into the gap at deep midwicket. A flat six.
a back of a length delivery outside off, Nair walks across, looking to swivel-pull to deep square leg. A thick top edge flies over the keeper

Yuvraj is gone? He's walking back! Nair played that quietly towards point and called Yuvraj through for a non-existent single. The fielder at point runs in, throws the ball back to the keeper and Yuvraj is welllll short of the crease. In backyard cricket, when you want the other person to get out, you call them for a run that isn't there and just say, sorry mate, next batsman. That's how bad that call for a single was
smashed for six! Tosses that one up outside off, Yuvraj slog-sweeps that easily over midwicket for six. Easy as
lots of hesitation. Full and wide, carved to backward point. Yuvraj and Nair move forward, then backward, then forwards. Then Yuvraj and Nair both go back. Lots of miscommunication

a humongous wicket for Mumbai! A 40-ball 50 from Gayle. He doesn't look too happy. That was excellent bowling from Mumbai, taking pace off the ball, bowling outside his preferred hitting areas. He's frustrated and therefore has a hoick at a length offcutter on middle. The ball takes the outside half of the bat and splices to deep midwicket.
a shortish delivery outside off, 127 kph. Gayle lets that one go
back of a length on leg, worked to deep square leg. This is Gayle's fourth fifty-plus scores in five IPL 2018 games. Out comes the baby-rocking celebration
slightly short, slightly wide. Enough for Gayle to slash a cut through point
a good delivery to end, the bouncer on leg. Gayle ducks underneath.
strays on the pads again. Not a bad line. But it's a full toss down leg. Gayle misses again. The ball ricochets to the fine leg boundary off the pad
dropped? A tough chance! Short and wide, Yuvraj under-edges the ball towards the keeper. Kishan dives to his left, gets there, but the ball pops out. A chance he should have taken, I feel
a slower ball with enough cut on the ball. Gayle wanted to work the ball to square leg, but the ball went past the inside edge. That's a weird stroke
it's a wide googly, the length is much better and makes Gayle play a difficult shot. He plays it well though. Slices the ball over backward point for four
the error is that it's full. The line hardly matters in new-age T20s. It's full and wide, Gayle gets underneath the length and pummels a lofted drive over cover. Another very big hit.
no quick singles! A slower delivery outside off, pushed to cover, Gayle sends a laboured Yuvraj back, ironic.
there comes that shorter length. Back of a length outside off, angling away. Gayle watches that go to the keeper
nicely bowled. Yuvraj comes charging, but the googly spins away. An improvised block.

yikes! A googly on middle and leg, it's a filthy long-hop too. Rahul picks the length early, his eyes light up with six. He rocks back and mis-times a pull to deep midwicket. Picks out the fielder to perfection. Wow, those are six runs missed and he's out.
a googly, wide outside off. Smashed back, right through the hands of Markande as he dives to his right
out the stadium! Back of a length on middle and off, Gayle was waiting for that, like the first ball. He stays back and goes baaaang! Way over square leg. How long? Looks like 750 metres
slower ball on middle and leg, Gayle backed away, creating some room, but didn't anticipate that length. Eventually, he blocks.
excellent end from Bumrah. Another well-executed yorker, played away to cover
well bowled! Attacks Gayle with the straight bouncer. Gayle ducks underneath that.
129 kph, carved over third man for four. Finding their fluency now. It's short and wider outside off, Gayle just slices the ball over short third man, like a tennis slice.
back of a length outside off, guided away to backward point. Some pressure on Gayle, 1 off 8, but he likes to start slow and back himself against spin later.
a short delivery that isn't quite straight. A bouncer outside off, Gayle lets that one go.
a slower ball around off, 117 kph. Rahul punches to cover and calls for a non-existent single. Gayle tells him something along the lines of not quite a run there.
looks to go straight again, it's full around off. Rahul tries to loft that over the infield too. Gets a thick inside edge into the pad.
edged, but short of wide slip! 138 kph, a wide yorker outside off. Gayle gets a thick outside edge, with a slight angle of the bat. Short of Rohit, good stop
another slower one, good comeback from Bumrah this over. Defended to point
into the second tier! 127 kph, it's a full delivery outside off. Rahul doesn't even extend his lofted drive, he just times a checked cover drive. The ball flies over the cover boundary
drifts on the pads, worked away down to fine leg for a run. Cramping Rahul for room

there's six. The first of the night. 1000 IPL runs. It won't be the last six of the evening either. A full delivery outside off, Rahul just caresses an extra cover drive and it travels well over cover
a pick-up pull! Good length on middle and leg, Rahul reads the length early and swivels into a pull, picks out a square fine leg
slower ball on off, and Karthik's attempted drive takes the outside edge. But just short of point, and then races away for a boundary! Kolkata Knight Riders win by six wickets!
full on off, and Karthik drives with the bat's open face. Not hit well, but that's what earns them the second run
Watto too slow! Low full toss on leg stump, and Karthik manages to flick it to the fine-leg boundary
back of a length on middle and leg, and once again down the leg side with Gill attempting no shot. He doesn't have to
back of a length on off, and angling into Gill. Stays on the back foot and taps it away towards short third man
short on middle stump, and just the perfect area for Karthik to make merry. Turns and pulls it fine down the ground to the leg-side. Awry from Ngidi
good length on middle, but going straight through. Kinda squares Gill up, but he manages to fend it towards the off side
full just outside off, and that's been driven with soft hands to the extra cover boundary. Enough time to take two runs and that's Gill's fifty!

short outside off, and Gill frees his arms again! Cuts it over point, and while it's a dangerous shot, the ball goes over to the deep point boundary. Rayudu in the deep tried to take it one-handed, but it was always going to be advantage Gill
good length outside off, and Gill backs away to slap it towards the point boundary. Man in the deep cuts it off
full outside off, and Gill cuts it hard. Straight to point however
good length on middle, but no real spin this time. Drags it towards the leg side off the back foot for a single. Gill keeps strike
full outside leg stump, and Karthik makes full use of the line. Goes down on one knee, and smacks a sweep to the backward square boundary
full on leg stump, and he taps it towards the vacant mid-wicket region. Karn has to go chasing behind it
almost a yorker on off stump, but he does well to get bat to ball. In fact, Gill does much better. Drills it down the ground to long off
full outside off, and Gill manages to get underneath this! Lifted over extra cover off the bat's sweet spot. The oomph!
full just outside off, and starts off with the cutter. Gill mistimes his drive, but far enough that Bravo can't reach it. DJ takes a tumble on his followthrough though
full outside off, but just about enough width for Gill to carve it off the back foot to the man in the deep
fast ball! Good length on off and zipping into Gill's pads. Does well to fend it towards the off side
on off stump, and Rinku defends it back to Jadeja
flighted full on off stump, but Gill magnificently whips this sweep to the deep midwicket boundary. Glorious
full on off stump, and Gill's happy to defend it back to Jaddu. Time out

good length on off stump, and he goes onto the back foot to cut. Misses, but the ball hits Dhoni's pads and hits the stumps. Looked like Singh was in the crease, but was his back leg up? Third umpire. Nope, he's good.

tries to cramp him for room, and earns the wicket! Back of a length outside off, but gets big on Narine. He still tries to muscle it to long on, but off the bat's inside half. Doesn't have the distance and comfortably taken by the man in the deep. Jadeja finally manages to remove Narine
back of a length outside off, turning into Narine, and worked off his pads to square leg
tossed up outside off, and that's been smacked over long on! In Narine's arc, and he makes full use off the lack of spin
cut beautifully through the packed offside field. Wide outside off, and enough room for Gill to free his arms. Slaps it between point and backward point
good length just outside off, but sharp angle into Gill's body. He goes onto the back foot, and defends with the bat's open face. Takes the outside edge, and goes past Dhoni's right to the boundary
full on middle stump, and Gill drives down the ground past the bowler
short outside off, but stays really low! Gill adjusts well though, and drags his pull to the square-leg boundary. Crunched!
good length on middle stump, and Narine makes room to slap it over point. It goes over his bat
on middle stump, and Narine mistimes a pull to square leg. Gets Gill on strike
full outside off, and Narine's attempted drive takes that familiar outside edge again. Third man tries to cut it off, but his sliding effort ain't good enough!
back of a length outside off, and the attempted pull has been top edged! Midwicket goes under it, and finally CSK hold on to a catch. Just that extra bit of pace that does Uthappa in
full just outside off, and Uthappa meets the drive on the full. Only to cover
good length on leg stump, and Uthappa tries to flick it fine down the leg side. Can't make the connect off his bat

full outside off and angling across Narine's body. He goes for a wild heave over cover, but takes the outside edge of his bat. Over the slip fielders and through for a boundary. The extra delivery hurts CSK
good length just outside off. Uthappa stays on the back foot and opens his bat's face to run it past the slip cordon to third man
good length on the fourth-stump line. Uthappa tries to pull, but mistimes it to midwicket. Off the bat's toe end
good length on middle, but Uthappa goes onto the back foot. Fends it back to the bowler with soft hands
good length on leg stump, and Narine backs away to punch to mid off

full on middle stump, and Uthappa takes his front leg across and simply flicks it off his pads to deep midwicket. Harbhajan's in the deep, but his attempted chase is futile. What sweet sound off the bat
fuller on leg stump. Narine moves to the leg side and thumps it to wide long on. Man there now
full toss, but Narine can't connect. It goes over the top of off stump and through to Dhoni on the bounce
good length on off stump and angling away from Narine. Narine simply backs away and thumps it to the long-on boundary
good length on middle stump, and Narine's attempted slog over long off takes the outside edge! Over first slip
good length just outside off, and Uthappa defends with soft hands towards third man

dropped by Jadeja again! Narine is a cat! How many lives?! Back of a length on middle, and this inside out slap comes off the bat's top half again. But Jadeja can't hold on to it after bending backwards to reach at this high ball. Hits his palm and pops out
over long on! Finally connects, and of course it goes beyond the boundary. Same length, and this time Narine manages to tee off
back of a length on middle stump, and too quick for Narine! Misses his leg-side slog and through to Dhoni
short, and aimed at Narine's head! Does well to sway and get away. Nice bounce

full on middle stump, and angling into Lynn. He tries to go for a leg-side heave, but the ball hits his front thigh and goes through to first slip! Goes to Watson at first slip, and they're appealing for caught behind! Brief chat between Watto and MSD, and they're reviewing. Replays show, it took an under edge before hitting his though. Lynn has to go
back of a length outside off, but angling into Lynn. Gets big on him, and defended off the back foot
full on middle stump, and this time it's been lifted! Gets his front foot out of the way and thumps it over Ngidi's head. Excellent
short on off, and that's been pulled into the stands! Quick shuffle of the feet to open his stance, and then Lynn's bat speed does the rest
back of a length on middle stump, and Lynn's pull comes off his bat's shoulder. Surprised by the pace

Dhoni closes out CSK's innings with a boundary. Back of a length on middle, 123ks, as quick as Vinay Kumar, Dhoni loads up and smokes it away to the midwicket boundary. If you're still wondering, Thala still has it
banged in short and fizzes away outside off, seam-up ball I guess, Jadeja swings across the line and top-edges it in the air. DK settles under the skier with the big gloves
Jadeja misses, DK misses, the result is four byes. Full and breaks away outside off, googly, Jadeja loses his shape on the slog-sweep, the ball sneaks through the keeper's legs
Jadeja hares down the track, meets a half-volley outside off and belts it past the head of Chawla. The umpire and the bowler both take evasive action
full and wide, Jadeja squeezes it out to sweeper cover for two
length ball, spins in at off, Dhoni lets the ball slide off the face to short third man
full and outside off, Jadeja backs away and muscles it to the covers. Another dot
really full on middle, Dhoni stretches out and sweeps it away to deep square leg. You don't often see Dhoni sweeping
flatter and faster, Dhoni miscues a slog-sweep to deep midwicket
Dropped by Gill! Dhoni hits it flat and hard to Gill at the edge of the square leg fence. He lets it burst through the hands into the boundary. Short googly, Dhoni skips back and swats it away
shorter and outside off again, Dhoni stabs it away to sweeper cover
tucked off the hips through square leg, another slower one from Johnson
back of a length and angling away outside off, Dhoni clears his front leg and launches it over Rinku Singh at the long-on boundary. Clean strike
Dhoni winds up for the leg-side hoick, Johnson bowls a slower offcutter on off, 118ks, Dhoni checks his shot and plays it back to the bowler
back of a length on the hips, 140ks, Dhoni hangs on the back foot and then swivels around. He was expecting that length. Swatted flat and hard for six
full on middle, Dhoni hangs back and bunts a single down to long-on
140.7ks short ball outside off, Dhoni sizes it up, fetches it from outside off and is airborne as he nails a pull over midwicket. Bang
back of a length, kicks up from outside off, 140ks, Dhoni loses his shape as he misses a pull
Jadeja gets on top of the bounce and rides a single to deep point
back of a length and slanting away wide outside off, past the reach of Jadeja, off-side wide
Dhoni presses forward, gets close to the pitch of the offbreak and works it with the spin to midwicket

Narine bursts through the defences of Rayudu with a sharp offbreak. Full, spins back in, dips at off stump, Rayudu looks to run it down to third man from the stumps. He does not connect. Narine hits the top of off and celebrates his second wicket
back of a length and spins in to cramp Dhoni for room and ping the thigh pad
back of a length on middle, Rayudu slogs it in the air, lands in front of deep midwicket running in
googly, breaks back in, Rayudu does not pick it, swings and manages an inside edge onto the pad
tossed up outside leg, Rayudu goes low and sweeps it flat and hard fine of short fine leg for four
Rayudu moves outside leg, Johnson goes full and wide, smeared away to sweeper cover
back of a length and angling across off, Rayudu goes back and steers to point
chest-high short ball on middle, Dhoni sits back for that length and pulls it comfortably to deep midwicket
Rayudu ventures down the track, back of a length and angling across off stump, opens the face and slices it away to the right of a diving DK
fuller than a good length on middle, Rayudu tips it to point and sends Dhoni back
good length and turns in slowly, Rayudu closes the face and scoops a leading edge to point

Kuldeep loops it up outside off and gets it to break away slightly. Raina stretches out for a slog-sweep. He has to fetch the ball from outside off and hit against the spin. He ends up dragging a catch to wide long-on
Rayudu hangs back and works a googly to the right of the bowler for one
back of a length and turns outside off, punched to sweeper cover off the back foot. Raina now becomes the top scorer in the IPL
very full and outside off, Rayudu goes low, drags it from outside off, rolls his wrists, and sweeps it away to the square-leg fence

Watson pulls it straight into the lap of deep midwicket. Back of a length, skids in on off, 94.3ks, Watson skips back and hits it off the bottom of the bat to Mavi who completes a fine overhead catch at the edge of the boundary
dragged down on middle stump, Raina shovels a pull to deep midwicket
tossed up outside off, not sure if it was the googly. Watson deploys a long stride, uses his reach to launch the ball over Kuldeep's head although it was not off the middle
short and spinning away outside off, Watson goes back and laces the wrong'un to sweeper cover
Raina hangs back to this full all on the pads and works to midwicket
very full and snaking back in, Watson plays around his front pad - like he had done in the most of his career - cops it on the thigh pad, but this heading down leg
very full and angling across off, 140.7ks, Raina carves a drive to third man
good length and slides back in, Raina does not pick the variation and chops an inside edge to get away
Watson shuffles across off stump, drops down to one knee, and laps a length ball away to the fine leg boundary. No protection in the deep
looped up outside off, wrong'un, Raina stretches out but does not meet the pitch, the ball spins in and beats the big slog-sweep
Raina rides the bounce of this short ball outside off and steers a single to deep third man
full and wide outside off, Raina reaches out for the ball with his hands and delightfully square-drives it to the right of backward point. Laced it away
Raina jumps across off and throws Russell off his line. The West Indian darts it outside leg, picked away fine on the leg side for four. Raina continues to deal in boundaries
speared full and outside off, Raina chases after a drive and is beaten

Chawla lobs it up outside off and gets it to break away, Raina reaches out for the googly and is beaten on the outside edge. Ultra Edge detects a spike, and this means DK has dropped it. It went quickly to DK, too difficult to close his gloves around the ball
hip-high short ball on the leg stump, Raina jumps onto the back foot and pulls it away to the square-leg boundary. Second four for Raina
much fuller and tighter on off, Raina presses forward to smother it
tossed up outside off, Raina stretches out for the ball with his hands and drives it in the air over extra cover. First-ball four for Raina

Chawla storms through Faf's defences with a zippy googly. He goes past the inside edge and hits the middle stump. Full, starts outside off, and spins back in, Faf searches for the legbreak and misses the variation

chest-hunting short ball on middle, Watson now unleashes the pull. He sends the lifter soaring over the fine-leg boundary. Watson uses the extra pace and bounce of his former Australia team-mate to his advantage

that's a rocket from Watson. Only a harsh man will call it a dropped chance. Hits Johnson's hand and still runs away to the boundary. Pretty full on middle, fiercely belted back to Johnson, who was more taking evasive action than attempting the catch. The ball smashes his bowling hand and skips away to the boundary. Johnson needs medical attention
half-tracker on middle, can't bowl that length, Watson goes deeper in the crease and mauls a pull to the midwicket boundary
dropped short and outside off, Watson goes deep in the crease and chops it straight to backward point
slides in at off, forward and played back to Narine this time
fizzes through just a shade outside off, Watson presses forward and taps to cover off the front foot
lifter outside off, fizzes off the pitch, beats Watson's hook. Beaten for pace and bounce

Mavi ventures wide of the crease, brings the ball back into Watson with that sharp angle. The Australian nearly plays on. Inside-edges it and hares across to the other end. Mavi swoops down on the ball and nails an under-arm throw. But Faf makes his crease with a full-stretch drive
full and angling in on middle stump, Watson still hangs back and defends
back of a length and angling in on middle, Watson sits back and defends it back to Mavi
Chawla beats the batsman as well as the keeper! Tossed up just outside off, and breaks away, Faf throws his bat at a slog-sweep and only connects with thin air
somehow he gets four. It's full and wide outside off, Watson wanted to hit that through cover but the ball took a very thick inside edge and went straight, for four, through mid-off
excellent start from Johnson. No looseners. Back of a length again, on middle and off. Defended into the off side
back of a length delivery, on leg. Watson blocks comfortably

Rajasthan need six off the last ball! This was full on leg stump, and Gowtham lifted it to long on. Iyer prepares himself at long on, but he can't hold on to the catch. Goes to the boundary on the bounce

run out at the non-striker's end! Full and wide outside off again, and Tripathi can't muscle this over cover either. Gowtham's quick to get to the other end, but Tripathi's too slow. Rajasthan need 10 off two balls

slower ball, but very full outside off. He can't slog it away and through to Pant on the bounce. They're running for the runs anyway, and Pant's throw to Boult can't be collected by the bowler. Rajasthan get the run
full just outside off, and Gowtham gets his front foot out of the way to lift it over cover. Two men in the deep though
back of a length outside off, but Gowtham's pull goes over short third man! Sliced, really, and that's a useful four runs
slower ball, but too wide outside off. Drills it over Plunkett's head but extraordinary from Maxwell at long on! Covers a lot of ground in the deep

appeal for lbw, and a chance for a run out as well! But not given lbw, so Plunkett reviews. It was full on off stump, and he tried to slog sweep towards the leg side. It had hit his front leg but would've gone down leg stump. The review's been lost.
good length outside off, and Tripathi goes down on one knee to wide long on. They're going for the second run too, and just make it!
full just outside off, and Short gets his front foot out of the way to smack it over long off
full on leg stump, and Short puts on his dancing shoes! Meets it on the full and sends it over long on
good length on off stump, and Short gets his front foot out of the way to thump it over deep midwicket! Just a bit too short from Maxwell

waist high full toss outside off, and Stokes thumps it towards the leg side. Straight down deep midwicket's throat, but Stokes thinks it could be a no ball. They're checking. It's gonna be close, but given!
full on off, and Short's extravagant leg-side slog finds the inside edge! Past Pant's right unfortunately for Delhi
full on leg stump, and Stokes backs away to make some extra room. Squeezed down to long off
full and wide outside leg stump. Stokes tries to clip it towards the leg side, but too wide in fact. Extras
yorker on leg stump, and Short clips it off his toes to deep backward square

Munro at cow corner! And that's the Purple cap for Boult. Full on off stump, and Samson's leg-side whip is mistimed. In the air for ages as Munro comes running in. Takes a sharp catch with the floodlights disturbing his vision for certain
shuffles across to the leg side, and Plunkett goes full outside leg too. Short clips it over midwicket, and finally releases some pressure
oh Short what are you doing here! Back of a length wide outside leg stump, but Short had already backed away too much. Can't connect with the pull as the ball hits his thigh
full and wide outside off, but Samson manages to flat-bat it over Plunkett's head. Off the bat's toe end, and down to long on
good bowling! Good length outside off, but Plunkett's smart enough to take the pace off the ball. Samson's through his attempted pull way too early
offcutter on leg stump, and Short mistimes the leg-side slog. Comes off the bat's inside half, and trickles down to deep backward square
good length just outside off, and Samson chips it past the non-striker to long on. Misfield by the bowler too, but they can't take another run
done by the googly! Full outside off, and Buttler came dancing down the wicket. The ball zips straight through and Buttler's way out of his crease. Mishra held his length back just a bit
arm ball on middle stump. It's the yorker this time, and Short squeezed it down the ground
slower ball, wide outside off and Buttler goes chasing after it again. Misses the shot this time though, and through to Pant on the bounce
short on leg stump, but Short can't put it away. Mistimes his pull, and the ball goes towards the leg side
full toss on middle stump, and Buttler's leg-side slog goes behind square. No one there, and Buttler earns another boundary
full on off, and Short tries to play his own reverse. Misses and taken sharply by Pant
good length outside off, and spinning away from Short. Fended to point, but they're hesitant for the single
nearly bowled! Good length on middle, but Buttler misses the reverse sweep this time
An 18-ball fifty! The fastest fifty by a Rajasthan batsman EVER. It was a full toss outside off stump, and Buttler played the reverse sweep over third man's head

tough chance, but dropped by Pant! Good length outside leg stump because Buttler was shuffling across to the off side. Misses the pull, and the ball hits his gloves as it goes down the leg side. But just too wide of the keeper
short on leg stump, and Short checks his pull shot. It was the slower ball again, and he plays it to short fine leg
back of a length, but wide outside off. Buttler tries to pull, but can only drag his shot to square leg
full outside off, and just the right length for Buttler to get under it. Picks the offcutter early, and thumps this inside out over cover
good length, but outside off stump. Punched to cover off the back foot, and they race across for a single. Buttler keeps strike
back of a length outside off, and Buttler opens his stance to pull this over cow corner! Fast bat speed, and Buttler's shoulders do the rest. Avesh gone for 18 already
cheeky! Good length on middle, but Buttler went running to the off side, and ramps it over the keeper's head. It goes all the way!
full on off stump, and it's in Buttler's arc. Small back lift but still hit over Short's head. Oof

back of a length on off stump, and Short pulls, but the ball goes under his bat and through to the keeper. The umpire raises his finger for the caught behind, but Short reviews straightaway. Replays show it came off his waist region
back of a length outside leg stump, but Buttler had backed away to the leg side just a bit too much. Cramped for room, and forced to tap it towards cover
short and wide outside leg stump. Buttler tries to pull but can't swat it anyway. No worries, it's a wide anyway
short on middle stump, and Buttler gets his head out of the ball's way. Nice carry through to Pant
full on middle and leg, but too easy for Buttler. Shuffles across to the off side, gets down on one knee, and slogs it over fine leg!
good length on middle and leg, but Buttler comes dancing down the wicket and lift it over Nadeem!
good length just outside off, and spinning into Short. Flicked off his pads to midwicket for a quick single

17.01 Yorker on middle stump, and Maxwell can't get his boot out of the way. Crashes into his toes in front of leg stump and the umpire has no hesitation. Maxwell's reviews, but starts walking to the boundary. Does he think it's out? Nope, it's raining. The players walk off as the third umpire adjudicates. He's out!
full toss wide outside off, and Maxwell slaps this towards the off side. An excellent diving stop at point keeps it down to one
slower ball, and full outside off. Plunkett shuffles across to the off side and clips it to Stokes at deep midwicket

Tripathi under it! Full just outside off, and Shankar goes for another biggie. This time it's off the toe end of the bat and long off was manning the boundary. Seventeen off six in a innings run-rate of 11.69. An excellent cameo
full on middle stump, and Shankar makes full use of the angle! Uses his wrists to whip it over fine leg
yorker! On leg stump, and Maxwell does well to get his toes out of the way and block it
short on leg stump, and too high. Shankar doesn't even duck and that's flown over his helmet
short and wide outside off, but Shankar tries to carve this over point. Slices it over slip instead, and that's another boundary
full on middle stump, and Shankar shuffles to the off side to flick towards cow corner. Maxwell wants two, and that's a well-timed run
good length on off stump, and Maxwell taps it towards long on off the back foot
we often see a wicket fall after the time-out, but rarely a six! Offcutter outside off stump, but too wide. Pant winds up, and thumps it over cow corner

Iyer holes out! A slower delivery outside off, Iyer backs away and chips an uppish drive to long-off. He wanted to hit that straighter, but the cut on the offcutter took that away from the bat, which meant he could only slice the ball. Tripathi just about holds on.

a slower offcutter around leg, Pant goes through the shot, but it takes the glove towards Buttler. He throws directly at the bowler's end, the ball ricochets away. Stokes runs around and lets the ball go through his legs. That's very sloppy
a slower ball outside off, chopped to third man. That's Iyer's fourth fifty in five matches
a slower ball and six more. It's slightly wide outside off, Pant stays in his crease and crashes an uppish drive over cover. Sensational timing from Pant.
a slower delivery outside off, slogged away to long-on. That's also Pant's fifty, off just 23 balls
absolutely pummeled through cover! Full and wide outside off, Pant smashes that past the fielder at cover again. Great timing too
140 kph, it's full and wide. Pant absolutely hammers his drive to cover. The ball goes right through the fielder's legs for four. 20 runs off that over, better overs will go for more.
and now he bowls a low full toss that is wide. Pant drills the drive through cover. Smashed past the fielder.
six more. That's some tripe from Dhawal. It's short down leg, all Pant needs is some bat. Even better if he gets a top edge, like this one. Way over fine leg for six.
that's very well played. Flat on off, Pant switches his stance and paddles the scoop over short fine leg. A reverse-paddle scoop. What else, T20s?
it's too short from Gowtham, on middle and leg. Smashed into the gap at square leg for four.
well bowled, slower and wider outside off. Iyer drags a sweep to deep midwicket for one
he's picked that and deposited it into the stands over midwicket! It's full around off, Iyer stays low and T20s that away over midwicket. A heave and a slog.
it's another offcutter, just too predictable. Iyer drills that shot straight, over the umpire's head. Stokes runs around from long-on, running to his left.
short, 126 kph. Pant hurries to get inside the line and help that along to the fine leg boundary. Just inside the boundary.
Archer errs, he bowled that full and straight. Pant got ably underneath the length of that and lofted that cleanly over long-on for six. Superb hit.
goes short, very short outside off. Iyer just slices a cut over backward point. Over the fielder and into the boundary for four.
a slower ball, Pant picks the length and swats the ball over midwicket. That's just smashed.
another one that strays down leg, wide. Just like Stokes' previous over
another short delivery, back of a length outside off. Pant can't connect with his attempt to pull to square leg
hurried for pace again. A short delivery on the ribs, Pant misses this, and is struck on the midriff. Ouchy!
that's the fourth six he's gone for. Some more flight outside off, Pant has had enough of plodding about. Swings through the line and lifts the ball comfortably over long-on
81 kph, the googly, pitches outside leg. Pant unwinds and looks for a slog sweep but misses. He's struck on the pad

chipped back to the bowler! It's a legbreak, around middle, extracts some turn. Shaw stays in the crease, looks to drive the ball to long-off, but he's not in a great position. Because of the turn, all he can do is hit a leaden-footed poke back to Gopal
a good length delivery is tapped towards point. Iyer sends Shaw back. The throw from point to the non-striker's end is accurate, but the ricochet allows one overthrow.
that's a poor ball, very lucky he's got away with that. Looked like a short legcutter, but on the hips. Shaw swivels on a shot and picks out deep square leg
goes short, a bouncer on middle and leg, Shaw gets underneath that.
six more, into the stands! This one is dropped short, around off. Iyer rocks back and swats a pull over deep midwicket. Great hit again. Playing the spinner's probabilities
the quicker one, Iyer knew what was coming. All he does is chip a lofted flick over long-on. Full and very quick, smashed!
it's very full again, around off. Iyer clears his front leg and powers a drive to cover, all along the ground.
90 kph, flat on middle and off. Iyer comes down and misses a flick, struck on the thigh pad

goes through with the shot again! Three offcutters from Unadkat and they've all been smashed! Shaw goes through with another lofted drive, this time he gets plenty of timing and power behind the stroke. Clears mid-off easily.
four more! Good comeback this from Delhi. Another cutter, Shaw just times his bunt this time. Much more in control, decent-enough timing for the short boundaries and four through mid-off

has he got enough? Just about to clear mid-on. Back of a length offcutter. Shaw picks the length but not the variation, which is why the timing is bad. Still, he gets enough to chip the ball over mid-on and into the boundary
finds the gap this time. Full and wide, Iyer gets forward and slices a drive to deep point
full outside off, Iyer still manages to angle his bat face and guides the ball to cover point
carved away through backward point. Full and flat, and quick outside off. Iyer stays inside the line and scythes the ball in the air and in the gap
lovely shot. Flat outside off, Shaw backs away and punches a drive quite comfortably through cover
swatted away into the gap at extra cover. It's another short, slower delivery. Shaw picks the variation early enough and thrashes the ball into the gap at cover

goes again, six more. He's just picking length very quickly. Once he does that, it's all a bit too easy for class batsmen, like de Villiers. Shaw shows some of his skill with a bottom-handed loft over mid-on.
shorter, back of a length outside off. Shaw gets over the bounce, watches the ball down and guides to short third man
a pick-flick for six. Back of a length, down leg, Shaw gets underneath the length and chips the ball elegantly over midwicket for six. Massive hit.
the second bouncer? No, says the square leg umpire. How do bowlers keep getting away with this? Dug in very short, Iyer ducks and looks at the umpire immediately.
too straight again and picked away. Not been a great over, 135 kph, on the pads. Iyer just gets a bit of bat on that and tickles the ball fine, to the fine leg boundary.
dug in short again, Shaw gets underneath. The one for the over, well used again
short and wide from Archer, not the best start. Slashed away to backward point.
a short delivery outside off, a very clever change in length to earn himself a dot ball. Banged in and Iyer ducks. One over, one for one.
a good length delivery on middle to start to Iyer. Pushed to mid-on

edged and gone! An inside edge is taken by Buttler. A golden duck for Munro. It's nice and full again, inviting a drive. The ball moves back in, in the air. Munro goes driving, but he's played slightly outside the line. A thick inside edge is found, Buttler dives to his right and takes an easy catch. Excellent bowling to persist with that full length in swinging conditions.
a bit of width! Full and wide, the ball moving further away. Shaw mis-times a drive towards extra cover.
ends with a sixer! But it doesn't matter for RCB. Full outside off, and Cutting slogs this over long off to finish the game on a semi-high. Royal Challengers Bangalore win by 14 runs!
back of a length outside off, but Southee takes the pace off it. Pulled to cow corner, but these are consolation runs
full outside off, and Cutting drags the slog towards the leg side. Deceived by the slower ball, but enough power behind that shot to beat deep midwicket
knee-high full toss outside off, and Cutting muscles a pull to cow corner. De Grandhomme saves some more runs in the deep with a sliding effort
that defied the laws of Physics! Full on leg stump, and Krunal got down on one knee to ramp it over fine leg. Takes the leading edge, and goes to wait for it point.

full toss on leg stump, and Krunal can't put it away. Hits his front leg as they scamper across for the run. Another run added to the extras. They're reviewing . Where's the impact?! Oh wow, it's an inside edge. Excellent from umpire Erasmus, who had given it a run in the first place anyway
slower ball outside off, and Krunal lifts this inside out over cover. Deep extra cover does well to race across and intercept
experience showing here! Yorker on middle stump, and all Krunal can do is dig it back to the bowler
de Grandhomme saves a certain four! Great sliding effort at long off. The full ball was crunched past Southee, but his fellow New Zealander saves RCB three
slower ball, on off stump. It's angling across his body, but Krunal's leg-side heave is mistimed. Goes to long off instead
full toss on middle stump, and Krunal's leg-side push doesn't come off. Appeal for lbw by Siraj, but Erasmus thinks that was bat first. Yep, he's spot on
almost a yorker outside off, and Hardik does well to dig it out. The ball's going towards Krunal, and Siraj can't field it despite the effort
offcutter on leg stump, and Krunal comfortably flicks it to short fine leg. Calls early for the single
Siraj and wides. What a love story. Good length, but way outside off. Goes to QDK on the bounce
good length on off stump, and Krunal's leg-side pull takes a leading edge towards long off!
into the second tier! Full on leg stump, and Krunal takes a big step forward and muscles it over deep midwicket. It was the offcutter, and the batsman pounced onto that in a flash!
good length on leg stump, and Krunal backs away towards the leg side. Tries to fend it but takes the inside edge towards deep midwicket
back of a length on middle stump. Krunal stays on the back foot and punches it past the bowler's left. Man at long on though
offcutter on leg stump, and Krunal's deceived for the pace. Tried to pull but through his shot too early. De Kock can't grab onto it either, so Krunal manages to steal a run
good length on middle, and Pandya misses on drive. Inside edge onto his pads, and that's why the umpire says no to the lbw appeal
good length on leg, and Krunal shuffles across to the off side and paddles this fine. Virat was lurking at leg slip but just past his outstretched right hand. He's not happy
good length on off, and turning into Krunal's pads. Nudged off his pads to square leg

offcutter on middle stump. It's angling across his body, and Duminy cuts to deep point. He wants the second run, but that could be dangerous! QDK quickly takes the bails off, and we need the third umpire. He's gone! Bat on the line, but you know what they say, that crease belongs to the umpire. (adds a dollar to the cliche jar)
full on off, and delivers the cutter this time. Duminy does well to judge the pace and pushes it past Hardik to long off
peach! Full on off and Pandya tries to defend off the front foot. But the ball grips the pitch and spins across his blade. Could've easily taken the outside edge
full outside off, and Duminy sweeps it to the man in the deep. Hands the strike back to Hardik
full on off, and Duminy comes dancing down the wicket. Drives to midwicket, but the fielder slides across the surface to stop it from going past him
full on off stump and Duminy carefully defends off the front foot
good length on off, and spinning away. Pandya gets onto the back foot and cuts to the man in the deep
full on middle, and Duminy takes a big stride forward to drive towards mid on
full on leg stump, and Pandya misses the on-drive. Hits his back leg and dribbles away towards short fine leg
drilled by Pandya. Full on off, and he gets his front foot out of the way before tonking this past Chahal. The bowler does well not to get his hands to it
good length on middle stump, and Duminy's quick to gauge the length. Swivels and pulls this along the carpet to the deep backward-square boundary. The extra ball hurts Siraj
good length on leg stump, and Duminy's leg-side flick comes off his bat's shoulder. The ball runs down to fine leg
tries the offcutter, but misses the line. Full on leg stump, and going past Duminy's pads

soft dismissal! Edged to QDK. Good length outside off, and Pollard tries to play the late cut. The ball just about seams away after pitching and that induces the edge. Comfortably taken by the keeper and Siraj is ecstatic!
full on off stump, and Duminy's on the back foot. Fended with soft hands
fixes his line. Full on off, and Duminy's forced to defend off the front foot
good length on off, and Pollard shuffles across to the off side and works it off his pads to backward square leg
good length on off, and once again spinning away from Pollard. Tries to play a late cut, but takes the edge. QDK can't hold on! Dropped
crazy spin! Good length outside off, but sharp legspin after hitting the surface. Pollard just stayed on the back foot and let it go
back of a length outside off, and seaming slightly away after pitching. Pollard tries to pull again, but that shot's been eluding him all evening. Goes over his bat and through to QDK
good length outside off, and enough width for Pollard to chop this cut to third man. The fielder's pretty square in the deep
back of a length outside off, and Pollard tries to pull this over to the leg side. The ball stays slightly low and goes under his bat
full on leg stump, and Duminy's on drive takes a leading edge! Falls short of cover though
back of a length outside off, and Pollard comes prancing down the wicket before flicking it off his pads to midwicket. No one there, so Siraj is forced to go chasing behind it
slower ball, but short outside off. Pollard thinks about pulling but chooses not to go through with the shot. Good choice. Earns him an extra run
good length on off, and Duminy stays on the back foot and cuts it behind square to the man in the deep
good length just outside off, and Siraj takes the pace off this time. Duminy rides the bounce and fends it towards the leg side
good length on leg stump, and seam movement for Siraj. Angling across Duminy, and he defends it with soft hands off the back foot
good length outside off, and Pollard tentatively pokes at it. Tapped towards point and the fielders come swooping in

hits him just under his throat! Pollard doesn't react. Short on off, and Pollard takes a step forward before choosing not to duck. The ball's well directed and I can't believe Pollard shows no emotion
good length on off, and Duminy misses again! If this were baseball, he'd be struck out. Tried to defend it towards cover off the back foot
full on off and angling across Duminy's body. Tries to drive but goes across his bat's blade and through to the keeper
good length on off stump, and Duminy tries to chop it down fine to third man. Hurries onto him and he's too slow to get his bat to ball. Through to keeper
crunched! Full on off, Duminy gets onto the front foot, and drives it through cover. Full followthrough of the bat, and once the ball clears the infield, it's only has one place to go
full on middle stump, and Southee's still getting that beautiful shape into the left-hander. Driven off the front foot to mid off. Says no to the run
full outside leg stump, and it's the offcutter on this occasion. Goes down Duminy's leg side though
good length on off, and Duminy taps it off the back foot with soft hands. It's going to point, but enough time to scamper across for the run
full outside off, and angling further away. Duminy's happy to shoulder his arms and collect the extra run
lovely! On a good length outside off, and just about shaping away from Yadav. He tried to defend off the back foot but didn't account for the swing. Just past his outside edge
wide yorker, sneaks under the bat. De Grandhomme searches for a quick single but he has been sent back. Kishan can't throw down the stumps

Southee tees off but he can't clear the short boundaries at the Chinnaswamy either. Back of a length and outside off, Southee drags this slower ball to Cutting at long-on. Fine overhead catch from the Australian
Sundar is the third batsman holing out in the 18th over. Back of a length and outside off, Sundar swings across the line but can't clear deep midwicket. He picks out Rohit
slower offcutter, nips away outside off, Sundar hangs his bat out and is beaten by the change-up
back of a length on middle, kicks up, Sundar hangs back and pokes to the covers
Kohli holes out off the next ball, to wide long-on. Pandya hits a back of a length outside off, Kohli does not get on top of the bounce ends up splicing a catch to Pollard
Mandeep holes out to deep midwicket and slaps his bat on his helmet. Slower ball outside off, Mandeep goes low for a slog-sweep but ends up miscuing it to Suryakumar
really full and outside off, not quite a yorker, jammed back to Bumrah
slower ball outside off, Mandeep picks it up and smites it into the stands beyond midwicket. Nice, clean swing of the arms
Mandeep rides the bounce of this short ball outside off and glides it down to deep third man
back of a length and angling in at off stump, Mandeep rolls his wrists, and pulls it away in the gap at square leg. First boundary after 21 balls for RCB
back of a length and wide outside off, Mandeep slashes and misses
Kohli forays down the track, knuckle ball, bounces and beats Kohli outside off
back of a length, slower ball outside off, Kohli delays his punch and finds cover. McClenaghan's offcutters are sticking in the pitch
Kohli steps out even before the bowler delivers, Bumrah drags his length back further, spliced over the bowler's head
back of a length and outside off, Kohli shovels it away to wide long-on

this a gem of a delivery from Bumrah! Back of a length, angling in from wide of the crease, sharp angle from Bumrah. Then straightens away outside off, past the outside edge. Ultra Edge detects a nick. Mumbai, however, did not go for a review. How costly will that turn out to be?
Baz backs away outside leg, Bumrah follows him, guided down to third man again
chest-high short ball on off or just a shade outside, Kohli is rushed for pace. He splices a pull over midwicket. Pandya runs in from the deep but the ball drops in front of him
tossed up on the leg stump, Kohli flies down the track and sends the white ball flying into the stands beyond midwicket. Muscled away
full and slides in on middle, Kohli pokes the ball to cover
half-tracker on off stump, keeps low, Kohli adjusts and swats it away to wide long-on
too full on leg stump, Kohli stretches out but misses the sweep
floated up outside off, Kohli comes down the track, nay runs down the track and belts it straight past the bowler and the umpire
good length, drifts in on middle, sticks in the pitch, Kohli spoons it in the air but to the right of short cover
full on off stump, this is a Kohli special. He backs away outside leg, collapses his back leg and drives it inside out over extra cover
wide of the crease, chest-hunting ball, angling in, Kohli rides the bounce and works the ball away through square leg
short and on off, Kohli drops the ball to backward point and sets off for a risky single. Baz jams his bat into the ground and loses his bat. A direct hit from Duminy could have had McCullum
Markande tosses it up on middle, full, played back to the bowler

a bit too full for the sweep, Vohra is beaten and has been given out lbw by umpire Erasmus. Did that pitch in line? Vohra chats with Baz and calls for a review. Think it pitched just outside leg and pinned the front pad. Ultra Edge does not detect an inside snick. The tracker suggests it pitched on leg stump and would have clipped the outside of the leg stump. Vohra has to go. Over to Kohli to rescue RCB again
nice and full outside off, Vohra stretches out, uses his reach and nails a slog-sweep over the short leg-side boundary. Launches it over midwicket
De Kock makes room again. McClenaghan hits the blockhole and keeps de Kock quiet
another slower offcutter outside off, 127ks, de Kock does not read it. He slogs waaaay too early and is beaten lavishly
De Kock makes room and steps out, McClenaghan chases him, cramps him for room, and hits the thigh pad
back of a length and breaks away outside off, de Kock ventures deep in the crease and chops it away to sweeper cover
shorter and spins back in on off, Vohra stands tall and punches it down the ground to long-on. Vohra has hit 27 off 11 balls from Duminy
Make that four boundaries in four balls. Tossed up wide outside off, this was pushed away from his swinging arc, but Vohra collapses his back leg and laces it inside-out over extra cover
Vohra hits a hat-trick of boundaries. Duminy loses his line, length, and his head. Back of a length and sprayed wide outside off, swatted across the line to the midwicket boundary
fuller and just a shade outside off, Vohra aims for another loft again, this time he slices it over mid-off. This goes all the way
tossed on off stump, Vohra ventures down the track, manufactures a half-volley and lofts it straight of mid-on. Lovely swing of the arms
keeps it on a back of a length, the line is outside off, Vohra rides it down to deep third man
back of a length and angling away just a shade outside off, possibly a slower ball, de Kock waits on it before dabbing it to the leg side with soft hands
back of a length on middle, nearly 145ks, Vohra dares to step down the track and only drags it off the inside half past the right of mid-on
McClenaghan hits a hard length on off - neither driveable nor pullable - patted to the off side
full nip-backer from McClenaghan, de Kock is late onto it as the ball skids off the pitch. He squirts an inside edge onto the pad and weathers an lbw appeal
back of a length, slower offcutter, sticks in the pitch, bounces, Vohra closes the face early and pops a leading edge to cover
back of a length and angling across off stump, Vohra has a mighty whoosh at it  and only collects fresh air. He attempts a leg-side slog and loses his shape
back of a length, Duminy finds turn again and catches the batsman on the crease. Hits the thigh and would have missed the leg stump
quicker, faster, and sliding into the pads, Vohra drops down to one knee and smokes a slog-sweep over the square-leg boundary. Bam!
wide yorker, very good from Ngidi, squeezed out to cover
length ball, angled down the leg side as the batsman backs away. Pressure getting on to Ngidi

is that a six? Yes, it is. Shankar with some timely blows here but have they come too late? Short of a length, he backs away to give himself room and heaves it over cow corner. DD need at least three more of these
slower length ball again from Bravo. Shankar is ready for it, and pounces on it as he carts it over long-on
now he switches over to a short length and Shankar crunches a pull over deep midwicket. Bravo getting his lengths all wrong at the death  but CSK still well ahead
full outside off, slower ball as he rolls his fingers over it, and Shankar lofts it clean and straight over long-on
Dhoni runs back and fails to get his hands on it. Just brushes the glove as he's backtracking after Shankar gets a top-edge on the pull after getting tucked up on the pull

has he picked out the fielder here? Yes, he has. Short and angled across, Pant tries to slap it and ends up skewing it off the lower part of the bat as Jadeja runs forward from sweeper cover and snaffles it
fullish, angled across, Pant stays stapled to the crease and swings and misses
short and angled across, Pant fetches a pull from outside off and ends up dragging it to long-on
leg-side length ball, Shankar backs away and cops it on the pad as he misses his flick
low full toss on middle, Pant smokes it past long-on. One-bounce over the boundary. But is it a boundary too late?
extremely full outside off, Pant drills it out to mid-off
back of a length on leg stump, that's a poor line again, and Pant just helps it along through fine leg as he swivels through
short ball, gets a little big on Pant as he sways away and tries to pull, makes no decent contact
Shankar slaps at the sight of width but it only goes so far as sweeper cover on the bounce
can't bowl there at this stage of the innings. A fuller ball on the pads, and Pant whips it off them over deep midwicket

sloppy effort from Rayudu gives Pant his fifty. Launches this fuller one without much timing straight over. Rayudu runs across from long-off and slides across and sticks one hand out and lets it go through
short ball, Shankar can't get on top of that as he pulls away to midwicket
sprays it on a leg-stump line and Shankar whips it off the inner part of the bat past Dhoni to fine leg
that's as flat a six as you'll ever see. Floated up outside off, Pant gets down for a slog, fetches it from outside off and it sails flat over long-on
very full on the stumps, Pant drills it straight to long-on with force
101.5ks, fired outside off, Pant charges down the track, gets under it and smokes it over midwicket for a mighty six
103ks, short dart outside off, Pant shuffles across off, falls on the floor but still muscles it over midwicket
pushed through outside off, keeps low, Shankar goes low with it to keep it out
Jadeja rattles Maxwell's stumps with a 100.3ks dart. Good length and slides in from around the wicket, Maxwell swings down the wrong line and only collects fresh air
Jadeja ventures short and wide outside off, Maxwell frees his arms and laces a cut to the left of short cover
pushed through on off, Maxwell presses forward and taps it back to the bowler
back of a length on top of off, Maxwell sits back and punches it down to long-off
dropped short and outside off, Pant slashes at it and under-edges it behind
full on middle, tipped to the leg side. Pant attempts a non-existent single now but is sent back
tossed up outside off, Pant reaches out for a drive and inside-edges it back onto the pads

Awful mix-up between the wickets, and Iyer has been dismissed. This was on a length and outside off, hint of turn, Iyer stretches out and pushes it to the right of Watson at short cover. He goes for an non-existent single, he is halfway down the pitch, Pant sends him back. Not enough time to undo his steps. Dhoni delays taking the bails off. Bring on Thanos, please
dragged short and outside off, Pant uses his feet and forces it down to long-on
back of a length again, slides in on middle, Iyer punches a single down to long-on
back of a length and skidding into the pads, Pant hangs back and clips the ball through square leg
another slower ball on middle, Pant reads it, drops it to the off side and scampers across for a single
back of a length on off, Iyer allows the ball to come onto him, then lets it slide off the face to Rayudu at short third man
kicks up from a back of a length outside off, Iyer has a loose waft at it and is beaten on the outside edge
back of a length and outside off, slower one, Pant delays his cut and carves it between slip and backward point. Ten off two balls
whoa, what a way to get off the mark. Length ball outside off, Pant plants his front leg, extends his hands, and punches it up and over the wide long-on boundary

The back-of-a-length ball works for Asif and CSK again. That's the right length to bowl here in Pune. Munro shimmies out again, Asif pulls his length back and attacks the body of Munro. He aims to slog it away but only toe-ends it to Karn at deep midwicket
banged in short and angling away outside off, Munro was waiting for this length. He upper-cuts it over Watson at slip for a flat six. The ball hits the ad boards on the flush
half-volley outside off, Munro clears his front leg and simply blasts it past the bowler with immense bottom-hand power
slower, short ball outside off, 111.5ks, Munro shapes for the cut. He waits for the ball to arrive then scythes it up and over backward point

Munro shimmies out again, this time he clears mid-on. He manufactures a half-volley by venturing out of the crease. Dragged from outside off over mid-on. Munro did not middle it but he will not complain
back of a length and outside off, Munro throws his bat at the ball  and misses
Watson errs too full and outside off, Munro shimmies out, picks it up and swats it across the line over midwicket. He watches the ball sail over the short leg-side boundary
Watson bangs it short and outside off, Iyer can't get on top of it. Splices a pull over midwicket
Iyer backs away again, Ngidi follows him and cramps him for room. Played back to the bowler
Iyer backs away outside leg and manufactures swinging room. Ngidi goes shorter and wider outside off. Iyer still reaches out and slaps it through the covers like a boss
117ks slower ball kicks up outside off and foxes Iyer

Asif bounces out Shaw. He runs in hard and hits the pitch harder. Dug in short on off stump, 141.9ks, rushes Shaw into a pull. He is late onto it and splices an overhead catch to Jadeja, who runs to his right from mid-off and pouches it safely. CSK's gun fielder. CSK's specialist fielder? Asif soaks in his maiden IPL wicket
overpitched on middle at 140.7ks, Shaw stays still and belts it right over Munro's head for an authoritative four
bouncer, angled in on middle, 138.6ks, forces Shaw to duck under it
on a length and outside off, 139.7ks, Shaw lines up for a loft but miscues it off the toe end to the right of mid-off
back of a length, slanted across, another swing and a miss. Good start on his debut for Ngidi
shortish, angled across off, Munro jumps and blocks
full outside off, Dhoni slaps it to the left of long-off to finish the innings and a 22-ball half-century

has that been dropped? Ok, wait, is that a runout? Yes, it is. Lots of things happened there. Dhoni got a glove as he tried to pull this short ball and Pant drops it after diving to his left. Rayudu, in the meantime, has crossed over to the other end enthusiastically looking for a single only to find that Dhoni hasn't so much as moved a toe. All he can do then is sprint back to his end but then Boult nails a direct hit
slapped right past the bowler. Boult, predictably, shortens his length, and Dhoni steps down the track and hammers it past the bowler's left

full toss again. These are all attempts at yorkers that are going horribly wrong. Daredevils having a tough time against the best death-overs batting unit this season. Dhoni swipes and pummels it over deep midwicket

that's perhaps the biggest of the night. A full toss outside off, Dhoni whips it with powerful wrists and sends it soaring over backward square leg. Way, way back into the stands. Also ruins what had been a good over for Daredevils

dropped. Colin Munro puts down a straightforward catch. He had to move a little to his left alright, but he did well to get behind it and then just lets it pop out. A mistimed pull from Dhoni that led to all of that drama
huge strike. Too full, too straight, Rayudu advances and gets right underneath it before shovelling it straight over
short on off, whips it away with a flat bat to backward square leg. Straight to the fielder but there aren't too many that can get one over on Dhoni when he decides to take off for a run
slower length ball at 123.1ks, Rayudu makes a little room and slaps it through cover
another early shuffle, and Daredevils honestly aren't doing enough to make late adjustments. It's a short of a length delivery that's just too straight, and Rayudu pulls to deep fine leg

Rayudu takes a leaf out of Dhoni's book and walks across too. It's an attempted yorker gone wrong as it ends up being a low full toss. Rayudu doesn't quite muster up the same power as Dhoni but it's enough, nevertheless, to carry the ball to long-on
again walks across even before Boult takes his jump. It's a length ball around middle and leg, and Dhoni flicks it away to the fine leg region
more brawn from Dhoni. Another bottom-handed jab as the bowler overcompensates and bowls it fuller outside his off-stump. Smashed over long-on
that's just been jabbed with brute force. A short delivery sitting up nicely around the sixth-stump channel, and Dhoni shovels a pull with terrific bottom-handed power
tossed up and spins away outside off, Dhoni races down the track, meets the pitch of this legbreak and launches it over the long-off boundary
half-tracker outside off, Rayudu pulls against the break and ends up dragging it away to wide long-on
low full-toss on middle, Dhoni hangs back and simply bunts it down to long-on
fired on a back of a length on middle, Dhoni steps out and hacks it to midwicket off the inside half. He tears back for the second
very full and outside off, 143.1ks, Dhoni opens the face and searches for the gap but drives the ball straight to backward point

dug in short and skidding into the body, Dhoni aims a pull and is caught in a tangle. He misses the ball but hares across for the leg bye even as Avesh runs in and swoops down on the ball. The throw from Avesh is so very wide of the stumps at the non-striker's end
Dhoni gets on top of a short ball outside off and punches through the line to the man on the sweeper boundary

Mishra does well to float this up to Watson and entice him. But he's taken this away from him with some drift in the air, and it results in Watson skewing a lofted strike off the outside part of the bat. Into the hands of long-off
full and sliding towards leg, Rayudu gets down and crunches a sweep through fine leg
another wide half-volley, Watson simply opens up his arms and smashes it through extra cover on the up
Rayudu tries to slog from outside off and ends up dragging it down to long-on off the inside of the bat
full with enough room outside off, Rayudu steps down the track and shovels this over extra cover
fullish length around off, Watson nudges into the leg side

an ugly swipe across the line sees the back of Raina. Nicely floated up around his off-stump, and Raina is expecting it to turn away. But it simply slides in with the arm and beats the inside edge before clattering into off-stump

du Plessis holes out to long-off. Not his most fluent inning, a run-a-ball 33 when the team's going nearly at 10 an over. Lofts this fuller one but the bat turns in his hands as long-off grabs it reverse-cupped
another fuller ball, du Plessis heaves it over the extra cover region and it lands between that fielder running back and long-off running to his left
fuller and on middle, Watson stretches out, meets the pitch and nails another slog-sweep, this sails waaaaay over midwicket. He has hit seven sixes already

half-tracker on leg stump, feeds Watson's strength again. Watson drops down to one knee and smokes a slog-sweep over square leg. Raina stands up and applauds from the dug out. Watson raises a 25-ball fifty
tossed up slower and higher outside off, Watson stretches out and drives a single to wide long-off
another slider just outside off, Watson pushes it back to Mishra
back of a length and outside off, Watson runs it down to third man
half-volley on the pads, Watson loves it there, he picks it up and flicks it up and over backward square for a flat six
overpitched and outside off, looks like a cross-seamer, Watson lunges forward, gets under the length and launches it over Plunkett's head. Watson holds his shape like a boss
full and wide outside off, Watson stretches out and slices a single down to third man

Watson has top-edged it and fetches a six. Chest-high short ball outside off, Watson can't get on top of the bounce. He swings his hands at a pull anyway and skies it to Mars. It drops down beyond the wide long-on boundary
on a length and outside off, but Faf had jumped across off even before Plunkett had delivered. Merrily scooped away fine of short fine leg.
very full and veering into the pads, Watson picks it up, twirls his wrists and lifts it over midwicket. He exploits the short leg-side boundary, again
hip-high short ball outside off, you've got to get it up higher, Mr. Plunkett. Watson lines it up and pulls it disdainfully over the midwicket boundary. Bam!
Faf moves away outside leg again, Tewatia now follows him with a 90kph dart, which is dragged away to wide long-on
Tewatia goes short on middle, Faf jumps away outside leg, collapses his back leg and laces it inside-out over extra cover
141ks full-toss wide outside off, Watson reaches out for the ball but misses again. Dhoni slapped a similar full-toss over the point boundary the other night at the Chinnaswamy
pretty full and zipping through outside off at nearly 143ks, Watson has a big drive at it and only collects fresh air
deft touch from Watson. 142.7ks, back of a length and outside off, Watson uses the pace of Boult to his advantage and glides it to the left of backward point for four

all action first-up. Inswinger from Trent Boult. Not given. Iyer reviews. Good length and snakes back in, Watson plays around his front pad - like he has done for the most of his career - and is pinned below the knee-roll. Pitching in line: check. Hitting the stumps: check. The tracker returns three reds. There was an inside edge but bat first or pad first? There is no conclusive evidence to overturn the on-field not-out call. This was really tight but Watson survives in the end

Gill hits the winning runs, takes his helmet off immediately and swings his bat in the air with his right arm, such passion! Gets a hug from Lynn. Short and wide, he stays on top the ball and cuts it square and fast
gets the wide yorker right this time and Lynn jams his bat in for a single to deep point

gone first ball on his 30th birthday! The crowd has come alive, I tell you. Siraj banged it in and Russell went hard at it with a swing of the arms, got only a top edge and de Kock ran a long way back to complete a superb catch

Chahal gets to the ball but it's gone for four! It was full outside off, Rana jammed his bat in to steer it just behind square to make Chahal run to his left from third man. He rolled to get his hands on the ball, but it went through

excellent running effort to catch that at deep cover but it's jut out of his reach! Rana didn't pick that googly, he miscued that with a leading edge and it went very high, Umesh ran a long way to his left, put in a dive but can't blame him for not taking that
superb wrong'un, Lynn sweeps as usual and that turns in dangerously to just miss the off stump
pivots on the back foot to pull, it's a slow bouncer and Rana mistimes it completely, it hits his arm and they run across for one
short enough for Rana to stay back and punch it square for one
looked like an offcutter outside off, Rana gets a thick inside edge to cover
too short, Rana rocks back and pulls it to deep midwicket
full delivery just outside off, misses the sweep this time, good reply from Chahal
a bit too short and Lynn puts his knee down and sweeps that with some power, from outside off and it's raced to the square-leg boundary. Wasn't too far from the umpire
he is sweeping everything. Pitched up outside off but Lynn plants his long leg across and sweeps
much flatter and quicker, Lynn tries to sweep again and misses!
sweeps it in the air  but it lands safely beyond square leg as Lynn went a fair bit across to off

the flight has worked, he holes out to long on! It was pitched up with a lot of revs, Uthappa got near the ball nicely, struck it hard and straight but Southee was waiting there at long on with his long arms. Ashwin is pumped!
nicely flighted outside off, Lynn moves towards the ball and bunts it down to long on

two from five balls and a short ball to end the over. That's sailed over square leg into the crowd! Uthappa did a little pivot on the back foot for the short one, and opened himself up to pull-swat that away
nice and straight towards the off stump, Uthappa says 'wait' after steering that to midwicket
that's a mean bouncer towards Lynn and he just about sways his head out of the line of the ball. One for the over
starts with a full delivery and Uthappa drives it back
beaten outside off! Beautiful leg break from Chahal around middle and off, tempting Uthappa to lean forward and defend, and then it turns away past the outside edge
what a beauty! You pitch it up to Uthappa and he will swing that bat absolutely straight and with such elegance. It goes straight and high for six
too short, pulled in the gap, not with much power and four more! Lynn went down on a knee when he saw the short ball and hit that one right between long leg and deep midwicket
Ashwin pitches this one shorter and Uthappa reverse-sweeps this one in the air and wide of Kohli to the third man area. Four more for the placement
reverse sweeps it straight to Kohli at slip after it was pitched up on off by Ashwin
slower one bordering on the wide line, not called a wide and Siraj must be relieved
short fine leg dives but it goes through him! Siraj angled it a bit too much into the batsman and Uthappa did well to glance it fine, although it should have been stopped
looked like he rolled his fingers over that one, on length around off and Uthappa finds Umesh at cover
back of length and angling into him, Uthappa defends it back

de Grandhomme at the same position, long on for right-hander, he jumps with a big stretch near the rope and just gets a hand to it. Was really really tough after Uthappa lofted it straight almost effortlessly
turns it a mile outside off! Uthappa went back in the crease to asses the turn and couldn't get close to it eventually
bit of flight outside off and Lynn paddles it away to long leg

strikes first ball, Narine holes out to long off! Tall man de Grandhomme takes a couple steps back at long off and raises his arms over his head to grab the ball and just keeps his feet inside the boundary. It was pitched up, Narine went straight down the ground but didn't get enough for this small ground
shot ball outside off and Lynn scythes it mercilessly behind square on the off side. That raced to the boundary in no time!
angles it in nicely towards the stumps, Lynn blocks it back
148kmh, short ball to Lynn, he pulls a bit swkwardly to long leg
full and straight at 145kmh now, Narine drives it uppishly down to long off
oh so close! What a delivery. Drift, flight, dip at off stump. Lynn backs into the off side and looks to swipe over the infield. It fizzes past off stump as he misses
slaughtered. Lynn slowly getting back to his best. Length ball on off stump, backs away into the leg side this time. Exposes the stumps and drives over extra cover on the up
