Markande finishes Mumbai's innings with a scooped four. He shuffles across off even before Kaul delivers, the bowler pushes it outside off, Kaul holds his shape and ramps it away fine of short fine leg to end the innings on a high. Sandeep Sharma embraces his Punjab team-mate Markande
full and outside off, Bumrah has a big whoooosh and misses. Kaul has overstepped? Tight call from umpire Llong
full and angling into a little chip to the leg side. Bumrah averts the hat-trick

big appeal for lbw from Sandeep. This looks plumb. Umpire Nandan, however, shoots down the appeal. SRH challenge the on-field not-out decision. Another knuckle ball, hits the back pad in front of middle as the batsman plays across the line early and misses the ball altogether. It would have crashed into middle stump. Umpire Nandan eventually reverses his decision
Sandeep puts Suryakumar out of his misery. He picks up his second wicket with the knuckle ball. Floated outside off, Suryakumar hits early and ends up dragging a catch to Hooda at long-on

Rashid storms through the gate of Cutting with another ripping wrong'un. This is slower through the air, breaks back in from outside off, Cutting ventures down the track, swishes and does not make contact. Rashid rattles the stumps and claims his first wicket of the night
slider just outside off, Cutting uses the pace of Rashid and scoops it over the head of the keeper
looks like a googly, bounces, Cutting sweeps . and misses

Pollard checks his punch but the ball has carried all the way to Dhawan at sweeper cover. 143.3ks short ball outside off, sticks in the pitch, Pollard yanks his bottom hand off the bat, the ball springs off the bat and into the hands of Dhawan. He slaps his thigh in celebration. What a bizarre dismissal
back of a length and outside off, Pollard can't connect with a little dab to third man
back of a length and outside off, Pollard reaches out for a cut and scythes it away past the right of deep third man sliding in the deep
slower bouncer outside off, bends away, past Pollard's reach
Pollard punches a six over Stanlake's head. Good length ball on off stump or just a shade outside off, Pollard takes a step back and lifts it imperiously with a high elbow
tossed up outside off, Pollard charges down the track. He isn't close enough to the pitch but still muscles it over the cover boundary
back of a length on off, Pollard punches it straight back to Shakib
tossed-up wrong'un, swerves in from outside off, Pollard did not pick the variation. It was tantalisingly close to the off stump
back of a length and on a fourth-stump line, Pollard chops his bat down and gets it away fine of short third man for a much-needed boundary
short, on top of off, punched back to Kaul
tossed outside off, Pollard sees the flight, stays still, and lofts it cleanly over Rashid's head for a boundary
back of a length and breaks away just a shade outside off, Pollard hangs back and stabs it back to the bowler
Pollard skips out, manufactures a full-toss, and flicks from off stump to deep midwicket
Pollard shimmies out, Stanlake digs it shorter and outside off, gets it to zip past the bat again

Another soft, soft dismissal. Non-turner outside off, Shakib lobs it up in the air. Krunal expects it to turn but it doesn't. He closes the face early and chips a leading edge to Williamson at extra cover
pushed through on off stump, Krunal goes low, and reverse-paddles it away fine of short third man
Shakib tosses it outside off, Krunal stretches out and drives it against the turn in the gap at the covers
tossed up just a shade outside off, Krunal presses forward and runs it back to the bowler

Kaul strikes twice in his first over. He hits the top of off stump and leaps for job. He brings out the knuckle ball, Lewis has no clue about this variation. He is early into his leg-side swing. Kaul cleans him up

good length on middle, Lewis manufactures room and slices it in the air over mid-off. Williamson runs back from mid-off, dives, then swivels around swiftly to stop the ball from the reaching the boundary. Excellent work from Williamson
overpitched and outside off - right in Lewis' swinging arc - he drills it away between the bowler and mid-off. Rasping drive
another fast wrong'un from Rashid. Lewis picks it off the pitch and jabs to cover
much fuller and sliding in on middle from around the wicket, catches Lewis on the crease. He quietly defends it to the off side
length ball on middle stump, Lewis creates swinging room outside leg and smears it over extra cover. Hit flat and hard for a six
short ball shoved down leg, Lewis sneaks inside the line and lets it go
back of a length and angling across off, Lewis aims for a big leg-side hoick and instead skies it over cover-point for a one-bounce four
chest-high short ball on the leg stump, pings the glove of Lewis was looking to fend it off
Stanlake responds with a fiery bouncer on leg stump, forcing the left-hander to duck under it
back of a length and outside off, 145ks, the extra pace of Stanlake works to Lewis' advantage. He stands tall and unleashes a jabbing punch through extra cover. Fetch that
around the wicket, full, angling in and straightening to take the outside edge this time. It wanders away fine of short third man for four. Sandeep threatening both edges
back of a length on middle and leg, Sandeep gets it to straighten, defended
First runs in the IPL for Lewis. He launches it into the second tier beyond fine leg. This was a poor ball. Short and sliding outside leg, he picks it off his hips and swivel-pulls it away

Shakib dives forward from square leg and pouches a low catch to dismiss Rohit Sharma. Another failure for him as Mumbai Indians' opener. This was short, skiddy, and attacking the body, Rohit is cramped up. This isn't a full-blooded flick. He chips it in the air and watches Shakib take a sprawling catch
shorter and just a shade outside off, Stanlake hits the bat hard, blocked to cover
Lewis pats the ball to the left of the bowler, Sandeep swoops down on the ball but misses the direct hit. Lewis wanted a risky single but was sent back by his partner

Deepak Hooda drops it! Sandeep hits a hard length on middle, cramps up Rohit for room. He goes for a pull, instead skies it in the air.  Three men converge on the ball, neither call, and Hooda runs back from midwicket, stretches his hands only to shell it
Sandeep starts off with a gem of a ball! Perfectly-pitched ball. Full, shaping to swing away, comes in, then again swings away past the hanging bat

a six to finish! Another swervy slower delivery outside off, Morris stands in his crease and smashes the ball over long-on for six. Rajasthan enjoy their hoemcoming too, beating the Delhi Daredevils by 10 runs
takes the catch! A slower ball on leg, Shankar bunts the ball away again to long-on. Stokes runs in and takes a simple catch to seal Delhi's fate. A match-changing 10 balls from Laughlin.
smashed on the helmet! This is a terrific delivery again. Doesn't bother with the slower ball, goes short and fast and accurate. Morris can't connect with a pull, the ball pings him on the helmet.

that's very, very high and taken by Gowtham! A slower delivery is right in the slot, he would not want it anywhere else? It's on the pads too. Pant swings too early again and hits the ball in the air, backward square leg runs in and takes the catch, a very good, smart, hold-your-composure catch.
was that required? Gambhir ain't happy with the shot selection. A full delivery on the pads. Pant looks for a switch hit, because third man is up. But the ball goes past and hits Pant on the pad.
116 kph. A slower delivery down leg, Pant pulls that, but gets the ball behind square for a boundary. Over fine leg. He's too early through the shot, but he won't care. Four.
well executed from Rajasthan, good from Rahane and Unadkat. A low full toss very wide outside off if sliced away to that deep backward point fielder.
well played, four. Again, the wide yorker. Morris slices the ball through backward point for four. Third man is up, point is back, which is why he bowled that line.
a nice, slower delivery on middle and leg. Pant swings to deep midwicket, the ball goes very high but lobs in no-man's land.
again, the slower floaty away-going delivery, beats Morris' drive. DOT!

the slower one, 113 kph, the ball pitches and swerves away. Maxwell backs away and swings himself off his feet almost. Some floaty, swervy bowling, maybe the knuckle ball? A thick outside edge is easily taken by Buttler. This has been a terrific over from Laughlin.
an excellent yorker, on off. Jammed away to cover. Superb delivery by Laughlin, three very good balls, but five runs easily made.

Laughlin's trademark slower ball. The offcutter. Full delivery outside off, Pant throws everything he has at the ball. The ball goes reallllly high, long-on runs in towards the 30-yard circle but the ball pops out. Tripathi the fielder. Three fielders converging. Dropped!

134 kph, four more. Three dots and three boundaries. Very predictable again, full and wide, but inside the tramline. Maxwell slices over point for four. That was a good comeback from the batsman after losing his shape.

that is maaaasive! Wheee goes the ball over long-on. It's a 116 kph offcutter outside off, and by now it's predictable. Maxwell shuffles across, gets underneath the length and says not every ball, mate. Pummeled over long-on.
136 kph, it's full and wide again, may have been a wide had Maxwell left that alone. Maxwell swings, gives the ball everything he has. A thick outside edge flies over short third man.
three wide deliveries, three dots! A full and wide delivery that is brilliantly bowled. Inside the tramline. Maxwell can't get bat on ball again.
3 off 7 for Maxwell. That was right in the slot. He has just gotten off an airplane. Full outside off, it's in the hitting arc and Maxwell misses his slog again.
a swing and miss! A very wide delivery outside off, Maxwell walks across, looking to heave into the leg side. The ball is too wide to drag. Wrong shot selection.
oh my. That's right in the arc. A short offcutter on middle and leg. Maxwell attempts a ramp over short fine leg, but shuffles across and is through his shot too early. Goes over leg stump
excellent bowling again. The offcutter with the wet ball is a brave ball. To get some cut and flummox the batsman is even more impressive. Pant is too early into the shot, toe-ended to the keeper.
excellent bowling. Maxwell is backing away, Dhawal follows him with a very full delivery. Almost a yorker. The ball hits the back leg, one leg bye.
a slower ball on middle and leg, Pant stays low and aims to help it along over fine leg, but can't make contact. Struck on the body. One body bye.
a flat delivery down leg, Pant stays low and heaves the ball over short fine leg for four. That's a poor delivery.
a flat delivery, on middle and leg. Pant comes down but the trajectory is much flatter. Inside-edged into the pad, and then into the off side. Gowtham runs to the ball to prevent one.
smashed for four. Pant comes running down, gets close to the pitch and nails his drive over the bowler. Good-enough timing.
a low full toss, a yorker. Pushed to long-on. Not much Maxwell can do with that.

a diamond duck for Munro! A flat start from Gowtham on the pad, the ball ricochets towards square leg. Munro comes charging down, looking for the leg bye but Maxwell sends him back. Munro turns around and heads back, but the throw is on the bounce to the bowler, and Gowtham takes the bails off, with Munro well short.

and out of a yorker! That's Buttler bread and erm butter. But he misses this. Buttler walked right across, looking to scoop the ball over fine leg, but it's a slower ball on leg. And very very full. Despite his excellent hands, he can't quite improvise fast enough to that delivery. Misses and the ball hits leg stump.
139 kph, strays down leg. Buttler misses a flick. Just clips the pad to the keeper.
142 kph, a full toss down leg, would you want it anywhere else? Buttler did not expect such a friendly delivery and reaches the ball very late. The ball hits the front pad, sliding down.
shortish outside off, Buttler misses his swing.

over long on! And CSK complete another heist. Full on middle stump, but Jadeja gets his front foot out of the way to smack this over Vinay's head. In the slot to be punished, and Jadeja does exactly that. It lands in the second tier and with that the CSK boys come running out! The hosts win by five wickets
full and wide outside off. Bravo drags his shot to long on this time. No chance of a double
good length on off stump, and Jadeja carves this to point for a quick single. Gets Bravo back on strike
full and slow outside off, but that's too wide! Jadeja lets it go as the umpire stretches his arms
short on middle, and Bravo pulls this square to cow corner. It's in the air, but falls short of the man at cow corner. Bravo wanted the second, but Jadeja chooses not to come back. DJ's not happy!
full and wide outside off, but that's been smacked over long on's head. Taken in the deep, but that's a free hit, so he's safe! Bravo comes back for the second

waist-high full toss on leg stump, and Bravo simply swings through to the leg side. It's taken a leading edge, but has enough behind that for the ball to go beyond the fine-leg boundary! Perfect way for CSK to start the over. Free hit as well
yorker on leg stump, and all Bravo can do is flick it off his toes to deep midwicket. CSK need 17 off the final over
short on middle, and Jadeja cuts it to Chawla at point. Diving effort stops the ball, and ensures they can only take the single

holes out to long off! Full outside off, but slightly slower this time. Billings is through his shot too early, and that comes off the blade's toe end. Billings walks back but not before keeping CSK alive in this match
half-tracker on middle, and Billings pulls it away over midwicket! Slight bend of the knee to keep his eyes on the ball, and then sent over the boundary with ease
good length on off, and that's been tapped to backward point. Jadeja scampers across to the other end, but more important, gives the strike back to Billings
smart bowling, but Billings will get to his fifty. Full and wide outside off, and the batsman is forced to drag a sweep towards the leg side
full and fast outside off. Jadeja can't make any connection. A useful dot to end Russell's spell
short outside off, and Billings pings this over square leg this time. Drags his shot to Kuldeep at deep backward square

back of a length on leg stump, but Billings was expecting that very length! Uses his bottom hand to flat-bat it over long on. Enough connection to take it beyond the boundary. Two terrific shots from Billings
ridiculous! Low full toss on middle stump, but Billings shuffles across to the off side. Gets to the other side and then paddles this over fine leg
short on leg stump. Jadeja tries to swivel, but can't pull effectively. Played to deep backward square
short on middle stump, but Billings makes room on the leg side. Can only punch it down the ground to long off though
full on leg stump, and pushed to wide long on. Curran cleans up, but Billings will keep strike
flat and full outside off, but Billings is quick to spot the length. Goes down on one knee, and bunts it towards the leg side. Manages to play it between deep midwicket and wide long on
good length on leg stump, and it's a quicker ball to welcome Jadeja! Hits his front leg, but would've probably gone down the leg side. Jadeja wanted the run, though, but he's quickly asked to go back

Dhoni walks! Good length outside off, and the ball stays slightly low. Tries to cut square but the ball goes under his bat. Takes a feather edge, and DK collects like a boss! They don't even bother appealing since the CSK captain starts to walk. Fair-play points, please!
flat and quick outside off. 114kph, in fact. Billings came down the ground and tried to slog it towards the leg side, but takes the inside edge to short fine leg instead
overpitched wide outside off. Dhoni muscles this down the ground to long on for only a single. Billings wants a second, but MSD sends him back
good length on off stump, but Dhoni gives it a charge again. Tries to flick towards the leg side, but comes off his thigh guard
flat on off stump. It's overpitched so Dhoni's cramped for space too. Defended towards the off side
short on off stump, and spinning across Billings. Flat-batted down the ground to long on
good length on off stump, Billings comes down the wicket and taps with soft hands towards midwicket. Nobody's there, so they comfortably come for the second run
short on middle, and Dhoni muscles his pull towards deep midwicket

waist-high full toss, Billings drags his pull behind square! Soars into the stands as CSK get 17 off the over. The ball was aimed into Billings' body, but he was in the perfect position to go through with that shot. Lucky that wasn't called a no ball
low full toss on middle stump. Mistimed to mid off, and Billings steals another single
full outside off, and Billings makes room on the leg side. In the slot for him to free his arms, and Billings sends it over deep extra cover! Comfortably lifted over cover
full on middle, and that's been smacked over Curran! Uthappa, at mid off, runs backwards but drops it! Gives Billings a reprieve
good length just outside off, and Dhoni glances it to point for a quick run
good length on off, and spinning away from Billings. Tries to sweep and he misses, but so does DK! More runs for CSK to collect
short and wide outside off. Too wide, in fact, and Dhoni's happy to let it go
smashed over wide long on! This game's back alive, folks! Tossed up on leg stump and Dhoni whips this off his toes and into the stands. Excellent bat speed!

straight down the ground! Full on off, and Dhoni comes shimmying down the wicket. Smashes it past Kuldeep thereafter, and the bowler did well to ensure he didn't get his fingertips to it. That would've stung
length-ball on off, but spinning away from Billings. Cut to Curran off the back foot on this occasion. KKR won't mind these
short on middle stump, but Dhoni can't time the pull well. Put a lot of power behind that shot, but mistimed to deep midwicket
good length outside off, but Dhoni cuts it straight to Lynn at short third man. Almost carried to the man, in fact. Dhoni will be relieved
half-tracker on off, and Billings works it to cow corner on this occasion. Misfield from Curran allows them to take the second run
flighted on middle stump, but Billings is up to the challenge! Comes down the wicket and whips it excellently past midwicket. Wide long on can't parry it back and that's a very useful boundary
full outside off, but zipping into Dhoni's pads. Tried to cut after backing away, but takes the inside edge. It goes between his legs and through to the leg side
flat to start off. On middle stump, and Dhoni defends it back to Chawla
wide outside off, and that's been cut hard past point. Quick bat speed on display from Dhoni this time
full on off stump, and Dhoni comes charging down the wicket. Tries to drive, but checks his shot in the end. Tapped towards Narine
good length outside off, but spins away from Billings. Worked towards the on side and played down the ground

short on off stump, and Raina tries to pull over cow corner, but he's got no power behind that shot - presumably because of his leg injury. The ball's in the air for ages, and Vinay Kumar settles under it at long on. Another big wicket down
good length on middle stump, and Dhoni makes room on the leg side. Punches it past cover to the man in the deep

big appeal for lbw! But turned down. Narine wants to review. It was a good-length ball on middle, and zipped straight through. Dhoni tried to defend but the ball sneaked between bat and pad. Impact's in front of middle stump, but would that have hit the stumps? Dhoni's big stride may have saved him. Yep, missing middle stump. Too high, so KKR lose their review

uses his bottom hand to lift this over extra cover! Full outside off, and Raina hits with the spin. Off the bat's sweet spot, and the ball lands just beyond the wide long-off boundary. That's the team hundred too
good length on off stump, and enough room for Dhoni to free his arms. Pulled hard, but not well, to Curran at deep midwicket
good length on off, and spinning further away from Dhoni. Flat-batted down the ground to long off

dropped by Curran! It was full outside off, and Raina lifted it over cover. Came off the bat's toe end, so it was in the air for a long time. Curran, from deep extra cover, runs in, but misjudges the catch. Drops it with the ball dipping in front of him
full just outside off, and Dhoni's neither here nor there. Stuck in two minds, but eventually pushes towards cover point with the bat's open face
good length outside off, and spinning further away. Dhoni cuts furiously past point. Played to the man in the deep
good length on middle, but takes some extra bounce! Dhoni manages to paddle this fine down the leg side, but looked rather uncomfortable
back of a length, but just outside off. Dhoni goes onto the backfoot, and blocks
full on middle, and Dhoni comes down the ground. Hits through the ball's line, and the shot goes one-bounce to long on
half-tracker on middle stump, but spins into Dhoni. Cramped for room, and can't flick it square. Hits his thigh pad
full on leg stump to Dhoni. Tapped back to Kuldeep off the front foot. Carefully negated
flighted on middle stump, grips and turns across Raina after pitching. Flicked off his pads towards midwicket on this occasion
full on middle stump, prods forward and taps it back to Narine
good length on middle stump, and Raina flat-bats this towards the leg side off the back foot
flat on middle stump. Defended off the back foot by Raina
full and wide outside off. Forces Rayudu to reach at it, but the ball's inside the tram-lines. An excellent delivery to end the over
low full toss on middle and leg, and Rayudu smacks it straight down the ground. Well stopped by the bowler on his followthrough, who sticks his right hand out
short on off, but Rayudu shuffles across to the off side. Pulls it behind square for a couple more
good length on middle stump. Raina opens his bat's face and runs it down to third man this time. They walk across for the single
almost a yorker on off stump, but Raina's up to the challenge. Defended off the front foot, and here's the time out

pulled, but holes out! Curran strikes in his first over. Short again, and this time the pull isn't hit well enough. Rinku Singh was placed at cow corner after the earlier pull, and this time Watson finds the man. Big wicket for the visitors
takes the pace off this time. Good length on middle, and Rayudu pokes at it. Played towards point for a quick run
full outside off, and Watson leans into a drive. Lifted over mid off, and it has enough behind it to go beyond long off! Ten off the first two balls
short outside off, and Watson's pulled this with some disdain! Over the infield, and no one's there at the cow-corner boundary
short on middle, and Watson swivels early to pull. Top-edged, but lands safe. Deep midwicket cleans up
good length just outside off, but Rayudu plays a delicate shot this time! Stands tall and waits for the delivery to come to him. Opens the bat's face and ramps it over the keeper thereafter
good length on middle stump, and Watson drops his gloves on this one. Worked to square leg off the back foot
quicker ball, full on middle stump. Watson defends off the front foot and sees the over out
good length on off, and Rayudu comfortably punches this square off the back foot. Beats the diving cover-point fielder and Curran can't pull it back either
tossed on off stump, and Rayudu punishes this once again! Goes inside out this time, and smacks this over extra cover! KKR are getting hammered here
and punished first ball! Full on off, and Rayudu comes down the wicket and lifts it over Chawla's head. Full swing of the bat
short on middle stump, but Rayudu misses the cut. He came down the wicket again, but was too close to his body for the shot. Taken by the keeper from near his head
good length outside off, but Rayudu comes dancing down the wicket. Tries to slog it down the ground but can't connect with the ball. Through to DK
good length on off, and Watson taps it off the back foot to mid on
shapes away! Good length outside off, and jags away after pitching. Watson tries to defend but the ball goes away from his bat. Could've easily taken the outside edge

overthrows. Watson dabs a length ball into the leg side and Karthik slides, swivels and throws a very very wide throw as he tries to run Watson out at the other end. Russell puts in a big dive to the left at mid-off but can't stop that
through the covers now! Vinay Kumar finishes poorly after two dot balls. Length ball outside off, onto the front foot and he punches it on the up
huuuuuge! Puts it up at a length on leg stump and boy does Watson love that. He's made room and is waiting for a clean swing through the ball. Vinay allows him that and he duly drills it over long-on
drops it short and into the body. Watson uses the angle as he stays tall and swats this past short fine
just over off stump. Watson expects this length ball to climb up and has gone for the pull. It slides through from under the bat and just clears off stump
raps him on the pad after getting this to nip back in off the pitch. Watson tentative as he looks to defend this
finishes with a six! Overpitched outside off, but it's in Russell's slot. Goes down on one knee, and smacked over long off! KKR finish on 202 for 6
saved by Dhoni! He had to dive to his right to stop that ball. Thakur went short outside off, and Curran walked across to the off side as well. But, the batsman can't get bat to ball
short on off stump, and Russell's pull doesn't come off. Bottom-edges it towards deep midwicket
width offered outside off, and Russell leans into the drive. It's been tonked over the infield, and the ball lands way beyond deep extra cover. That's his tenth maximum!
low full toss on leg stump, and Russell flicks this off his pads to deep backward square. Twenty-one runs off the over but importantly, Russell's on strike. Can KKR breach 200?

excellent yorker on middle stump, and Russell does well to get his bat down in time. It's inside-edged to short fine leg, and Curran's halfway down the wicket. There's a misfield there, so Russell chooses to run across as well. Could've been a run-out if Chahar collected the ball cleanly
three in three! Short on off, and Russell swivels to pull. Off the bat's middle and it lands beyond the man at cow corner. The KKR dugout can't believe it
Is that out of the ground as well? Russell's hit that so hard that he's down on the floor. It was another slower ball outside off, and Russell muscles this over long on. Hits the top of the roof!
it's full on leg stump, and Russell whips this off his pads! That's all it was, a simple flick, and the ball soars over deep midwicket. Raw power from Russell
overpitched, but wide outside off. Russell hits this hard into the ground, and the ball lobs over Watto's head. There's cover in the deep though

yorker on leg stump, and Karthik misses the shot. Hits his back leg, and the appeal's been given out! He's reviewing but that's a futile decision. It hit his back leg, and impact was in front of leg stump. The replay shows that the ball would've clipped leg stump. KKR retain their review but the captain has to go
goes extra short outside off, and Karthik pulls out of the uppercut. Good decision from the KKR captain as the umpire signals extras

through extra cover's hands! Full outside off, and Russell smacks this over cover. The man in the deep sticks his hands up, but the powerful shot goes through his palm. Brings up his half-century as well
now Karthik's joining in! Picks the slower ball nice and early, and DK slogs this over long on with disdain! Nineteen off the 17th over
good length just outside off, but tailing into Russell. Tapped off the back foot to cover for a quick run

slower ball, and that's a low full toss on middle stump, but Russell winds up early for exactly that delivery. Gets his front leg towards the leg side and frees himself up enough to swing through the ball's line. Hit flat over wide long on
slower ball, on a good length. Pitches on off stump and goes over Russell's attempted cut shot

that's out of the ground! Full on middle and Russell's spotted this early. Down on one knee, and swung over Bravo's head. A full 105 metres and even Shahrukh Khan needs to crane his neck to see that ball
goes short first. Pitches on leg stump, but Russell goes under the delivery. First-bouncer says the umpire

low full toss on off stump, but tailing sharply into DK's toes. Tries to play straight, but the swing forces an error from Karthik. He bottom-edges it to the keeper. Could've easily chopped onto his stumps however
good length on off stump, and Russell mistimes his pull to cow corner. They jog across for the single
two in two! It's a full toss on off stump, and Russell's not going to miss out on these. It's pumped over the non-striker's head and lands next to the sightscreen

overpitched outside off, and Thakur pays the price for missing his length. Down on one knee, and muscled by Russell over long on. It's not off the bat's sweet spot, but enough behind it to clear the boundary. Thakur's knuckle ball did not come off
full outside off, and Russell's not happy to have missed out. Swung through the ball's line, but it comes off the bat's toe end
full on leg stump, and Russell powers this down the ground. Beats midwicket's dive, but there's someone in the deep.
shouts of 'catch it' but drops well short of the man at cow corner. Full on leg stump, and Russell's leg-side slog comes off the bat's toe end. Was in the air for a while, though
full on off stump, and Russell smacks this past the non-striker to long on
over long on! Dropped in the stands, though. Full on off, in Russell's arc. Huge stride forward and makes a solid base to launch. Goes through with his shot thereafter, and it lands in the first tier
slower ball, on a good length outside off. Karthik keeps his eyes on the ball, and plays towards the off side with soft hands. Played into the gap in front of cover
another low full toss on middle stump. Russell bunts it down the ground - past Bravo's left - to long off
good length on off. The ball's angling into Russell, who chooses to defend off the back foot
full and wide outside off. Russell tries to drive with the bat's open face, but it's mistimed. Straight to point
good length on middle stump. Tapped off the front foot to cow corner for a walking single. A good over from Tahir so far
slower ball, short on middle. The ball's going down the leg side but Russell manages to flick this fine past the keeper. Comes off his thigh guard, in fact
width offered outside off, and Russell cuts this square past point. Man in the deep has to jog across to his left and intercept
good length outside off. Russell walks across to the off side and taps to point. Played with soft hands and that allows Russell to take the run
good length on middle, and Russell bunts this square on the leg side. Slogged - but mistimed - to wide long on

overpitched wide outside off, and Russell drives this past extra cover! Couldn't get under the ball, but he's got enough power to hit through the ball's line. Breaches the gap between cover and mid off
just outside off, and Karthik punches this firmly past cover to the man in the deep. Enough time to walk across for the run
good length on middle stump. Karthik goes deep into his crease and blocks off the back foot

good length just outside off. It's punched to cover but there's a hesitation! Raina stops the ball, turns around, and throws it at the non-striker's. Uthappa's struggling, and he's well short when the zing bails come alive. KKR gift CSK a wicket. Karthik wanted the single, but Uthappa wasn't quite sure. Pays the price

and gets a wicket first ball! Back of a length on middle, and Rana tries to drag this behind square on the leg side. He's through his shot early, and the ball takes a feather edge off his bat. It hits his thigh pad thereafter, and lobs up into the air. Enough time for Dhoni to run to his right and complete a soft dismissal
slower ball on off, and Rana judges the pace early. Lifts this over mid off with ease, and the back-foot punch races into the long-off boundary
short on off, and forces Rana to duck under it. Drops his knees and gets under the line of the ball
good length on off, and angling into Rana. Fended back to Thakur off the back foot
good length just outside off. Rana gets on top of the bounce, and cuts it just past point. Beats the infielder and looks like the man in the deep will cut it off but he fails to stop it
tossed up on middle stump, and Rana flicks this fine down the leg side. Calls early for the two, and they jog back comfortably. Chase for short fine leg
full and wide outside off. Rana tries to cut square but mistimed. Bottom-edges it this time
good length on off stump. Uthappa goes deep into his crease and punches it down the ground. Straight to long on
two in a row! And again in the same spot. Full ball and Uthappa simply gets to the pitch of the delivery and dispatches it for six more. Golf-like swing and KKR end the Powerplay on 64
full on off, and in the slot for Uthappa. Takes a big stride forward and lofts this over wide long on. Full extension of the arms, and that lands in the stands once again
full outside off, and Rana gets to the pitch of this delivery. Smothers it off his pads to square leg thereafter
the leg stump's uprooted! Flatter ball on middle, and Lynn's halfway down the wicket. He misses the leg-side heave, and the ball goes between bat and pad. Crashes into leg stump and Jadeja's pumped!

misfield at short fine leg! Harbhajan the man guilty there. Good length on off, and Lynn walks across to try and paddle towards the leg side. The ball takes his under edge, and goes to Harbhajan, but the ball sneaks under the fielder's fingers
classical Uthappa! Full on middle, and he's quick to get down on one knee. Goes through his slog-sweep and smacks this over deep midwicket. Lands in the stands
full toss on off stump, and Lynn muscles this towards cow corner

tossed up on middle and leg, but Lynn backs away to make some extra room. Muscles it over cover, and manages to do enough to lift it over the infield. Not off the bat's centre, but enough behind it to take it the extra-cover boundary
good length on off, and turning away from Uthappa. Punched off the back foot to cover, and he calls for a quick single. Comfortably completed
tossed up outside leg stump, and Uthappa tries to slog it towards the leg side. Can't hit it though as the ball comes off his front leg
full on off stump. Uthappa prods forward and defends it back to Tahir
half-tracker on off, but cramps Lynn for space. Defended back to Jadeja
good length on off. Lynn rocks back, but can't cut it well. Mistimed towards the off side
good length on off. Uthappa goes onto the back foot, and comfortably knocks it towards square leg
good length on off, and extra bounce this time! Uthappa tries to punch this straight, but comes off the bat's top half. In the air, but drops short of mid off. Played with hard hands
wide outside off again, and Lynn once again cuts this square. Straight to the man in the deep though
short and wide outside off, and Lynn slaps that past cover! Loose ball from Watto, and that's been crunched in front of the man at deep extra cover. No stopping that!
good length on off stump. Big step forward from Uthappa, and defended back to Harbhajan

dropped at square leg! What an effort from Chahar, but the ball pops out of his hand. Short on middle, and Lynn pulled that hard. Chahar dived to his right, but the ball just didn't stick in. Chance goes down
full on leg stump as he sees Lynn walking across to the leg side. He tries to slog towards the leg side, but mistimed towards midwicket

this one's bigger! Full on off, and Narine is quick to get his front foot out of the way. Makes the extra room, and goes through with the full swing of the bat. Off the blade's middle, and it lands in the second tier beyond long on. Eighteen off the over
and here we go! Soars over long on. Good length on off, and the ball's in Narine's arc. Cleanly swatted over the bowler with the bat's full swing
good length on middle, and swings into Narine. He tries to clip it square but misses the shot. Inside-edged onto his pads
pitches on middle, but angles down the leg side. Narine misses the leg-side flick and the ball goes to Dhoni on the bounce
on off stump, and Lynn sticks his bat out. Pokes it past point to the man in the deep. Tahir the man tidying up
slashed over point! Good length on off, and that's been cut square. Just over the fielder at point, and the ball races away to the boundary. Enough width for Lynn to free his arms
good-length ball first up. Pitches on off stump, and Lynn defends off the back foot
slow floated from Laughlin. On a good length, swaying away from off. He gets on the front foot and drops it in front of point with soft hands
lifts it past the bowler who is swaying away from it. Williamson hasn't connected this as well as he might have liked. Ends up slicing it a touch, but he's got right to pitch of length ball
carted! What power. Stokes having an ordinary time. Length ball wide outside off and he climbs into this, on the up
googly, back of a length on off. Gets on the back foot and looks to punch towards long-off. Gopal leaps to his left to stop one-handed
taken at mid-on. Williamson backs away and looks to pull this from outside off. Gets it straight to the fielder off the toe-end
shot of the night! Ridiculously easy from Williamson. Short of a length ball but he shuffles quickly into the off side and picks this from under his arm and to clear square leg boundary
gets him on the glove. Kulkarni takes his eyes off the ball as he shapes to hook. Too quick. It lobs pitch side but the bowler can't get to it

drags it on! Googly does Buttler. It's a third dismissal against Rashid after all. It's short of a length and he jumps onto the back foot to try and bludgeon this over midwicket with a pull. Through the shot early and it kisses the inside edge before tonking the stumps
caught behind! Bit tired of saying this now - Kaul surprises him. Gets it to rise sharply from back of a length. He's stuck between a pull and a fend. It lobs up easily for Saha off his front thumb
beaten by pace. Again. Kaul has been unreadable off the pitch. This isn't a great ball though, short and wide. Too late on the cut

sliding Rashid completes the job for Shakib! Superb bowling, superb catching. He pushes this very slow, very wide outside off in anticipation of him stepping out. And he does. Has to reach out in the end and he slices it high. Rashid sprins in rapidly from sweeper, slides on his knees and holds on

picks out long-on. This was coming. A loopy arm ball on a good length. Tripathi doesn't get close enough for his attempted slog and ends up dragging it flat to Pandey's right at long-on, off the inside half of the bat

falls short of third man. They're finding some serious pace off this surface. Tripathi steps out and is surprised by the short ball. Looks to hook and gets a leading edge that lands in front of the diving Stanlake

appeal for lbw again but it's turned down. Kaul is deceptive off the surface and skids another in at middle stump. Samson looking to punch through midwicket off the back foot. There's an inside edge on that but the umpire says it's leg bye
well placed. Rashid gives away the googly early by lobbing it wide outside off. Tripathi leans in, gets to the pitch and lifts it wide of long-off
length ball outside off, zips up as Tripathi shapes to play a cover drive on the up. Flies through to the keeper at chest height

taken on the second attempt! Williamson at long-on. Stokes looks to pummel a length ball over long-on from outside off. He hits it flat to long-on's left and Williamson loses his grip on the ball as he goes towards the floor. Then, he recovers and lunges ahead to hold on
inside edge onto pad! Oh Samson's a lucky man. Doesn't pick this googly and has all his stumps exposed as he looks to cut
beaten outside off. Or so the umpire thinks. Rashid pushes a slider across Stokes and he can't connect on the reverse sweep. Rashid thinks theremight be glove on that, but they won't review

picks out Rashid Khan in the deep! No, correction - Rashid Khan picks him up in the deep! This is a sprinting, sliding catch to his left at deep square leg. Rahane down the track again to meet the length ball at middle stump. It's a nicely timed flick and it's fairly wide of the fielder but he has held on without losing his balance
falls short of third man where Stanlake is stationed. Rahane steps out and loses shape as he looks to slog across the line to this length ball in the corridor
big appeal for lbw but Rahane has gotten well outside off stump for this attempted sweep. It's a full ball, not there for the sweep
leading edge flies over point. It's a good ball from Stanlake. 146kph outswinger at a good length, wide outside off. He's looking to flick it and he finds the point boundary
mean bouncer! Samson is stuck on the crease with no idea where this has gone as he shapes to pull. It's way over his head though
short of a length and wide outside off with some movement away. A lazy waft by Samson that would've been called lazy elegance if he had made connection. He's beaten though

direct hit from Williamson! Short is struggling. Sunrisers' captain swoops in from mid-off to pick up his mistimed drive and fells the stumps Short is caught short. Stunning work from Williamson. Short took off early for the run after punching on the up but there wasn't one there
length ball outside off, leans in nicely to tap on the up. Can't get it past cover though. Bit of a mix-up as they're both ball watching. Short runs back after covering half the pitch
Vinay Kumar finishes the match with a swat through mid-on to put Kolkata Knight Riders on the board, toppling KKR with a four-wicket win at the Eden Gardens.
full and wide outside off, the ball bounces over Karthik's drive.
digs it in short again. Karthik is waiting for that and pulls through midwicket for four. Shot.

Russell holes out! A slower delivery outside off, just inside the tramline. Clears his front leg, and skews the ball off the outside half towards long-off. AB runs back and to his right from mid-off. McCullum runs in from long-on. McCullum will never let the ball go. Nor will AB. They almost collide. But AB takes a good catch eventually.
a slower ball outside off, Russell is through the shot too early, toe-ends the ball back to the bowler.
called A WIDE! AND ONE BOUNCER! A short delivery on off, loops over Russell's head.
short and wide, Russell backs away, then goes back into the line. But the ball is well executed, just inside the tramline.
back of a length around middle, worked to square leg. Clever from Karthik.
DRE RUSS! In the slot from Umesh and Russell goes over long-on. In his wheelhouse, he clears his front leg and makes room for that shot. And then executes, way over long-on. Terrific shot.
full delivery around middle and leg, Russell backs away and chips the ball over mid-off.
ANOTHER BOUNCER! Just under the shoulder, deems the square leg umpire. It's another short delivery that hurries Russell through the shot. Beaten
excellently bowled. That has to be one bouncer for the over? IT IS. The first one I've seen today. Follows Russell, just beaten
another short delivery, this is under the shoulder though. Russell misses an upper cut.
full and wide outside off, 140 kph. Russell clears his front leg and smashes the ball to deep cover.
slow outside off, Karthik opens the bat face and guides the ball to point for one. An under-rated shot, using the face to hit the ball square on the off side.

and given! LBW. But Rana wants to review. That was the drifter. Sliding in through the air, pitches in front of middle and hits him in front of middle. That's relatively plumb. He missed a big sweep that he attempted, the ball was too full to play that stroke. No bat on that. Two reds and juuuust clipping the side of leg stump. A smile on umpire Shamsuddin's face. That was close.
short and wide outside off, the ball is too wide and Karthik scythes it away through point. Easily put away. Chahal's slow, wide delivery has become predictable
flight outside off, Rana looks to drive the ball through cover but mis-times the ball to long-off instead.
that's a good bouncer! 141 kph, short around off, first bouncer of the over, he used that well. Hurries past Karthik's pull
141 kph, back of a length down leg, off the glove or handle of the bat, down to fine leg. Karthik races back for two and makes it with a dive.
135 kph, that's close? Was there some bat? A low full toss on leg, Rana misses the flick, the ball takes the pad en route to fine leg. If there was no bat, that should have been out.
should have been wide again! Slow and wide outside off, Karthik missed his lofted drive but the ball spun past the tramline. That's two runs KKR should have got.
the flipper. Short, but very quick. A thick inside edge into the pad, Karthik didn't quite pick the length of that.
a shortish delivery around off, Rana goes back and pulls to deep midwicket for a couple. Played that along the ground.
the googly outside off, that's a very predictable delivery now from Chahal. Left alone, wide.
short outside off, Karthik goes back and pulls to long-on for a run.
very nicely played. A low full toss outside off, driven away through cover. He's kept to Sundar for so long, he knows what's coming. And finds the gap.
flat around off, Rana misses his sweep and is struck on the body
shortish and wide outside off, Rana's feet aren't moving much. The ball goes past
that may be the first bouncer of the over? Another bouncer on middle and leg, Rana gets underneath that too. Lots of bouncers from RCB.
130 kph, short around off, the ball is just below the shoulder as Rana lets that go the keeper
back of a length down leg, nudged towards backward square leg for a couple, very neatly played by Karthik.

131 kph, another short ball, the second in succession. This is way over the head. Was the previous one the first bouncer of the over? If so, this should have been a no-ball and not a wide. Karthik gets underneath and lets that one go
good bouncer, good leave. Back of a length around off, Karthik lets that one go through, dropping his hands to let that one go.
short, around off, Karthik misses a pull as he looks to pull, off the thigh pad to third man.
short outside off, Karthik lets hist first ball as KKR captain go to the keeper.

McCullum takes the catch at backward point. It's a bad shot, short and wide, the ball moving away, Uthappa looks to swat the ball over midwicket but it's the wrong shot. A cut would have been a better shot. But he chose the pull and to add to that, he's hurries on the shot. So the ball takes the splice and lobs up.

struck on the helmet! Is that the second bouncer of the over? No? Off the helmet towards third man, a good stop from the fielder. But that's surely the second delivery over the shoulder of the over? Only one allowed per over in T20s? Rana is not close to his pull by the time the ball pings off the helmet.
good stop from de Kock. 125 kph, a loopy tennis-ball bouncer over the head of Rana.
that's a fine start. Back of a length around off, Rana is hurried for pace, the ball beats his tentative poke.

Umesh strikes! A thick inside edge into off stump. A low full toss outside off, Narine is clearly harried for pace. He looks to drive the ball but he is very late on the shot, a thick inside edge hits off stump and RCB have some relief. A job extremely well done from Narine. He is the only player with two fifties off 17 balls or lesser in IPL.
beaten for pace. 136 kph, full outside off, Narine is not anywhere near the drive.

a 17-ball 50 for Narine. The last times these two sides met, Narine had hit a 15-ball fifty. Runs down to the ball and skews a lofted drive to deep midwicket to get there. Two fifties by an opener inside the Powerplay today, in both games.

this ain't no pinch-hitter. It's a naught full toss and Narine doesn't cross bat swat it away, or heave. He lofts the ball over mid-off because the fielder is inside the circle. Sensational ball-striking.
Narine does the bowler in the mind this time. Backs away, then does not. The ball is down leg. Wide.
104 kph, Narine clears his front leg, gives himself some room and drills a drive to mid-off

another offcutter, but he drags it down and it ends up as a half-tracker to swat away like a mischievous fly over midwicket. When it comes to roles for T20 sides, does Narine do it better than everyone else?
short around off, Narine looks to cut over the infield but can't make contact.
just over cover and four more. Another very vital Narine cameo. Back of a length on middle, Narine clears his front leg and chips the ball over the fielder
a slower ball is in Narine's wheelhouse. Narine clears his front leg and heaves the ball away for long-on. Massive timing.
a short and wide delivery outside off, maybe fifth-stump channel so not too wide. Narine is beaten for bounce as he looks to cut.
lovely shot. Waits for that flight to dip and not turn. Uthappa then swats the sweep over long-on with sublime timing, it was close to a cross bat but the power and timing was excellent.

de Villiers takes Lynn! A nice catch. A short, wide delivery outside off. Lynn is too far away from the ball to make adequate contact. All he can do is chip the ball away over cover. But there is enough airtime for AB to run to his left and backwards, his eyes peeled on the ball right through its trajectory and completes the play. Good bowling from Woakes too to bowl that wider
beaten again. Short and wide outside off, the ball bounces a touch extra too and goes over the bat of Lynn.
full and wide outside off, the ball swinging away. The ball goes past Lynn's hard drive. There won't be many easy catches with this form of batting.
just short of the bowler? Did it carry? Full outside off, driven back to the bowler. Woakes dives low in front, the ball goes through.
the flipper. Lynn does not mistake the flipper for a short delivery, blocked back.
flat outside off, pushed to cover for one. Sensible from Narine, batting like a batsman.
Narine gets low and sweeps Chahal for six through midwicket with more power. This is spin into Narine's arc. Right in the slot.
Narine starts with a sweep that goes over the bowler's head, immense power. A flat-batted smash.

a nice slower ball and Russell will take the catch! Two wickets in two balls to finish the over. Woakes is through the shot too early, the ball takes the lower half of the bat and lobs to cover. Russell runs back and takes a good catch.

taken on the deep sweeper cover boundary. Full and wide, Mandeep slices the ball off the outside half to the fielder. Just a little more power and that would have been another six. A very tidy cameo from Mandeep, the impetus is now there.
indeed, yes, a wide yorker outside off. Jammed back to the bowler. Vinay hurls a throw back to Mandeep in utter frustration.
six more! Back of a length around off, Mandeep clears his front leg and pulls easily over midwicket. Right in the slot. That's poor end-overs bowling.
four more. A low full toss down leg, Mandeep helps himself to four more runs with a neat flick over short fine leg. Can't bowl a full toss at this stage.
full on middle and leg, Mandeep clears his front leg and goes boom, way over long-on for six. Shot.
beaten for pace! Back of a length on off, the angle and the pace is too good for Woakes as the ball creeps between bat and pad.
full and wide outside off, Woakes opens the bat face and carves the ball through point for four. Sensational ball-striking, knew his area, didn't overhit.
back of a length around off, the ball beats the bat as Woakes looks to defend.
a poor ball, short and down leg, Mandeep helps it along to the fine leg boundary. Errant line, easy put-away
full on middle and leg, and Mandeep comfortably turns it off his toes to deep backward square. Time-out once again.
yorker on middle stump! Sarfraz does well to dig it back straight. Russell tries to get his fingertips to it, and manages to slow the ball down. They scamper across for the run anyway
full ball, and that's been driven past Russell to long on. They walk across for the run
tossed up full outside off, fended back towards the non-striker, and Rana's dive stops the ball. A terrific over for KKR comes to an end
swept fine, and it trickles away for a boundary. Full on leg stump, and Mandeep shuffles across to the off side and paddles this to the leg side. Deep backward square loses the chase

yorked! And he's on a hat-trick. It's a full ball on Kohli's toes, and he can't dig it out. He misses the defense and the ball crashes into middle stump. Rana, you beauty! Takes two in two and KKR are right back in it once again

skied! And taken at long on. Another short ball on off, but AB wants to send that into the Ganges river. Tried to muscle this over the leg side, but it's been top edged. Johnson calls for the catch early and takes a swirler. The part-timer has broken the partnership
good length just outside off, AB tries a big leg-side heave but can't connect well. Comes off his bat's toe end, and trickles down to long on. He'll keep strike
goes short! Pitches on off and jags away from AB. Tries to pull, but he's nowhere near the ball. Through to Karthik from near his face
yorker on off, but manages to squeeze this away to deep midwicket. Late tail into his toes, but well negated by AB

superb delivery from Johnson. AB premeditated the full delivery so he went across, looking to chip the ball over fine leg. But it's a sharp bouncer aimed at the wide tramline, which means it's extremely well directed.
a slower offcutter on middle, defended to cover. A very good comeback from Johnson

Johnson, who? This is tremendous batting. A slower offcutter, AB picks it so early and like he does off the last ball, knows which shot he's going to play, a lofted drive over mid-off with soooo much ease
goes short does Johnson. On middle and leg, and de Villiers nails his pull nicely into the gap towards backward square leg. He picks the areas to score earlier than any other batsmen I've seen

under-edged to the keeper? Did it hit the stump? Given out. Back of a length outside off, AB looks to cut the ball down to third man but the ball clips the top of the front pad. That was the big noise. The ball was close to the bat also, but UltraEdge says just pad, not bat. They will have to check for the lbw also. Impact says outside off stump so AB will continue on
gives himself lots of room. Narine goes the other way, and AB reaches out for it, taps to cover
backs away, and Narine follows him. The carrom ball, de Villiers stays low and sweeps over backward square leg. This is one of the best T20 bowlers
short and turning in, AB misses a flick, struck on the pad

there is no one better in cricket at the 1-2. If one is full, he expects the next one short. He did that to Rashid Khan, a bowler that has owned T20s recently. He's done that to Kuldeep, knows that Kuldeep will be slow and full. So he runs down and drills a drive right back. What batting. Awesome
picks the googly and then lets his hands do the rest. A wide googly, a ball that Kuldeep has owned recently. Lofted so easily over cover
some flight on middle again. AB is waiting to read the ball off the pitch, does and pushes to long-on
so easy for AB. Short and wide outside off, cut away towards cover who half-stops it. AB wants two but Kohli thinks maybe now now.
short and wide, the carrom ball, cut away to long-off. Think Kohli is just struggling a touch for timing.
another dot to Kohli, flat down leg. Kohli misses a flick, struck on the pad.
another swervy delivery outside off, AB opens his season with a neat drive to deep cover

gone through McCullum! A short offbreak, McCullum picks the length early, goes back and looks to hit that over midwicket but he was too early through the shot. The ball goes on and hits middle and off stump.
good change in length, the bouncer and well directed too. Short down leg. Kohli is late on the pull, it just about misses the glove on the way to the keeper.
on a length, around off, chopped away towards point. Kohli and McCullum almost collide, other than that, an easy run.
he's clobbered that with immense power. Runs down, gets close enough to Johnson's offcutter and then smashes the ball over mid-off. Muscular hit.
just erred a touch in line and that's in McCullum's wheelhouse. Full and wide, McCullum transfers his weight late and drills the drive through cover for four.
the floaty swervy delivery outside off, Kohli yorks himself as he defends.
overpitched outside off, pushed away to long-off for a run. These two very happy with playing Narine out.
looking for the late cut but fails to connect. Short and wide outside off, Kohli misses his dab
overpitched outside off, McCullum backs away and jams an attempted drive into the ground.
three dots to end the over, well bowled. Flat on middle and leg, driven back towards the bowler. Kohli happy to play him out too.
another googly on middle and leg, nudged to deep midwicket for one. Clever from McCullum.
flat outside off, McCullum misses a hard sweep and the ball just misses off stump. But Karthik whips off the bails nice and quickly. But has he got back in time? Yes. That's fine. He's safe.
picked that! And his area. The googly outside off, McCullum chips the ball over mid-off, and gets four.
five wides! Down leg and McCullum misses a sweep. Karthik misses his collection too, resulting in five wides.
the googly, picks him well. McCullum backs away, reads the googly and defends. Two dots in three balls.
overpitched on leg, driven to long-on for a run. Kohli easing himself into this innings, but hardly any dot balls.
terrific shot, good stop too! Some flight and Kohli flicks him with the wrists through midwicket. The long-on fielder dives to his right to save some runs
the leading edge, just wide of cover. Lots of flight, the googly. McCullum looks to work the ball into the leg side but the leading edge just evades the diving fielder
nicely bowled, the line is better, so is the length. It's wider outside off, turning in. But Kohli drives effortlessly to long-on
an overpitched delivery on off, worked away to deep midwicket for two. Can't undo Kohli with wristspin easily.

taken at short third man! Another indicator that de Kock did not read Piyush Chawla. A legbreak on middle and off, de Kock looks for a reverse sweep, takes a thick leading edge and lobs to short third man. Legspin comes with extra revolutions and very very often top edges too.
the googly! De Kock does not pick that! The googly outside off, de Kock plays for some legspin but the ball keeps drifting on and beats the bat
and then he bowls full and wide outside off, de Kock is welcomed to his new franchise with an overpitched delivery outside off. And de Kock drills a drive through cover to open his RCB account.
that's tripe from Vinay Kumar. He goes on the pads and McCullum says thanks with a neat flick through backward square leg. Too easy. 14 off 6 for Baz.
that's cleared fine leg! A short delivery on middle and leg, McCullum pulls but gets a thick top edge which flies over fine leg. McCullum has 9000 T20 runs too
nice length on a new pitch. 136 kph, full outside off. McCullum stands in his crease and defends to cover.
better from Vinay Kumar. Full and on a length, defended back
what a terrible start from Vinay Kumar. And what a delightful start for Mccullum for his new franchise. On the pads and McCullum tickles this easily behind square for four.
full and straight outside off, Miller looking to make room and carve it behind point but has to reach out as he drives to sweeper cover.
lofted but on the bounce to long on. Stoinis grimaces because he didn't get any power behind that
backs away and lofts this cleanly into the gap at deep cover. Used the width superbly. Poor from Tewatia, too short.

this time he picks the man out at deep midwicket. Another short ball outside off, Nair pulls, hits it very well but found Boult, who did superbly well to move low to his right to take this catch. Look of disbelief on his face as he walks off.

swung away to clear wide long on. That's a 31-ball half-century for Nair. Too short, he picked the length early and walloped this into the stands. Comes against the franchise that let him go too. Takes his helmet off and points to the crest. Top knock. Now to finish this off.
slips this down leg, Nair looks to help this past short fine but can't lay bat to it. Rolls to the fielder there off the thigh pad.
waits for the turn on this googly as he works it to deep midwicket. This was on the shorter side, so Miller had enough time to adjust and play it off the backfoot
drags this sweep from outside off to short fine. This was fired full outside off by Mishra. Pressure building?
slides on, Miller punches this to sweeper cover. They're walking this
chipped back over the bowler's head, down to long on. Nair wanted to hit that a lot square
touch short, Miller goes back into the crease and punches this to long on
slaps this to the cover boundary. Half-tracker outside off, asking to be hit. Miller walloped that away
Mishra is back and starts with a rubbish delivery down leg. Nair pounces on it quickly, paddled wide of short fine leg.
slides back in and skids through to hit the pad as Nair looks to work this gently into the leg side
the painful innings is over, pressure was building and Yuvraj has hit this straight to deep midwicket. Stepped out to pull, but didn't get any power behind that because he got it high on the bat.
slider that  beats Yuvraj  as he prods forward to defend
the power of his wrists and forearm, wow! This is a length ball sitting up to be hit outside off and Nair whips this from outside off, beats wide long-on. Delightful timing.
scintillating from Karun! This is overpitched from Shami and he drills this over extra cover. Top shot
leading edge that rolls to mid-off. Yuvraj was looking to work this square on the leg side.
slower and fuller on the stumps, Yuvraj shows the full face of the bat in defence.
looks to drive, gets a thick inside edge back to the bowler. Yuvraj struggling for timing suddenly.
gets this to straighten from length, Nair hops back and blocks
ripper of a yorker, superb from Boult, Yuvraj just about manages to get his bat down in time to keep it out.

the party is over. Shami takes an excellent catch running backwards at short third man. This is a full toss that angles away, Rahul looks to cleverly whip this behind square but ends up getting a leading edge. Shami called early, made ground and was in total control as it descended. Rahul has done his job though.
fire with fire. Drops short, Yuvraj picks the length early, swivels back and pulls him all along the ground to the square leg boundary.
starts off with a short ball on middle, Yuvraj ducks under this one
drills this straight to mid on. Agarwal checked his shot, not sure why, and has to go as Shami takes a comfortable catch.
fastest IPL fifty. KL Rahul, take a bow! A fuller one and Rahul comes down the track and meets the pitch before driving down the pitch to long-on
short again, this is tripe from Mishra. Line, length, all no good. Short and no turn and Rahul pulls it away to midwicket
Mishra slides one into the pads now and Rahul gets down for a sweep and top-edges it to deep fine leg as he falls over
oh, dear! What short of a delivery is that! Mishra drops it short and Rahul backs away and carts it over long-off. Slapped away
shot! Rahul producing a masterclass here. Advances down the ground to a loopy one and splits cover and extra cover with a neat drive
short of a length outside off, Rahul doesn't entirely get behind the line this time and doesn't middle it. Whipped away off the inside of the bat through square leg
six more. Shami bangs it in and angles it in around middle and leg, and Rahul gets the angle he's looking for to swivel and smoke it over fine leg
make that a hat-trick of fours. Too much width on offer outside off, and that's Rahul's cue to open up his arms and shovel it through sweeper cover
short of a length, angled across, Rahul gets the front leg out and punches it through extra cover
a top-edged six. That's an outrageous six. Rahul simply swiped at a short of a length ball around leg stump and had zero room. Just carries all the way over fine leg
fuller outside off, Rahul drills down the pitch

full, straight and the off stump has been flattened. This one reversed in late to beat the swing. Christian went for the glory hit but couldn't get under the length. Superb delivery. Outstanding stuff.
makes room to carve this behind point but Tye bowls this full and straight outside off. Beaten
the flipper from Ashwin, hurried on to beat him for pace, somehow managed to get some bat on it as he squeezed it out.

one switch hit too many and is gone. This is not the most intelligent piece of cricket from Tewatia. Ashwin outfoxes him by getting to drift in, spin away just a wee bit to hit him on the box as he swung through. As plumb as decisions can get.

hje's misread the googly and has paid the price! Steps out to hoick this into the leg side but doesn't quite get to the pitch and slices this to cover where Tye was running backwards from the infield, wasn't in balance but somehow managed to hold on to the swirler. Superb catch. Mujeeb's superb initiation into the IPL continues.
drilled past the bowler, beats long on. Solid hit. Got to the pitch and hammered it. Pant is in top form, batting as if he was netting somewhere before coming in
too short, Pant helps him over short fine. Cleverly done. This was a slower ball gone wrong.

this is hammered deep into the stands at deep midwicket. This is the kind of game he struggled to bring to the fore when he was playing for India. This is a length ball, Pant was waiting for it as he muscled it away. Too much power off the bottom hand.

run out missed at the bowler's end by KL Rahul.  Big mix-up. Pant looks to hoick but misses, hits the pad and deflects behind the stumps. He wanted a leg bye but was sent back. The throw at the bowler's end is very, very wide.
full and angling away, Pant drills this to wide long off where Karun Nair can't bend down in time to cut that off. Tried to parry it. Lazy effort, should've been stopped
short of a length on off, Gambhir waits on the backfoot and pulls to the right of deep midwicket for one
sees Gambhir advancing and fires this in, whipped to deep midwicket
punched back, Ashwin can't get across in time to stop it off his own bowling despite doing all the hard work in running to his right, down to long on
first of the legbreaks from Ashwin , turned across the line towards midwicket

finally flighted one, got it to turn and has been rewarded. This is much slower through the air, Iyer is drawn forward as he shapes to drive but couldn't get to the pitch. The faint nick has been well taken by Rahul behind the stumps.
slips this full delivery down leg, Iyer overbalanced as he misses this flick. Wide called. This was another knuckleball

slapped away! Almost as if Gambhir was expecting that. Goes back and across as he powers this pull into the gap at deep square leg. Pulled it from way over his head and yet kept it all along the ground
this is a knuckleball outside off, Gambhir absolutely drills this on the bounce to Yuvraj at mid off

height may have saved Iyer. This ball pitches at length on off and skids straight on. Iyer looks to play across the line, misses it and is struck on the flap of his right pad. It comes back as umpire's call.  On field not out stays.  Rod Tucker was the umpire in question.
crunching stroke this! Fires this full and flat on leg stump, Gambhir goes down on one knee and sweeps him over square leg. One bounce to the fence. Disdainfully done
clears his front leg, makes room and goes inside-out over cover. Typical Gambhir stroke. Lovely timing
spins back in sharply to beat Iyer's push, deflects off the pad to short fine leg

dream IPL beginning for Mujeeb as Munro has fallen to an attempted switch hit. Doesn't even bother reviewing because he was plumb. Mujeeb got this full delivery to drift in from around the stumps, Munro got himself into a tangle in trying to reverse sweep, and once he missed he was a dead duck. Massive strike!
length ball that kept a touch low, Gambhir works this from outside off towards midwicket
hits the deck hard at length, Munro punches this towards mid off for a quick single
opens the bat face late to steer this away-going delivery to square third man. Typical Gambhir stroke

smart stumping from KL Rahul. Munro beaten by sharp turn. Excellent change of pace from Ashwin. Munro has no clue about this as he jabs at the delivery. He dragged his back foot outside the crease for a brief moment, but managed to just about plonk it back in. Lucky break
nicely tossed up on off stump, Gambhir eases this down to long-off
slides back in from wide of the crease, Gambhir works this into the gap at square leg. Ashwin got this to drift back in a long way

CSK mark their return with a stunning win! Overpitched and outside off, Mustafizur loses his length, Jadhav leans back, uses the depth of the crease, and belts it through the covers. Cracking finish from Bravo and Jadhav

Jadhav shovels it all the way over short fine leg for a six. WHAT A CRAZY SHOT. Jadhav, you beauty. He shuffles across off, drops down to one knee - injured hamstring and all - and ramps it all the way to the boundary. He might not have ventured this shot had fine leg been back. Is this the game? Tahir runs across from the other end and hugs Jadhav
good length and slanting away outside off, Jadhav opens his face and dabs it straight to short third man

Bumrah stays round the wicket but shifts his length. Bumrah ventures shorter and wider outside off, Bravo loses his timing and his head. He splices a catch to Rohit at extra cover. Bravo was aiming for the signature loft over extra cover but it got big on him
Bravo is carrying CSK home. Low full-toss on middle stump, Bravo clears his front leg and wallops it into the stands beyond midwicket for the third six of the over
slower yorker, 112ks, Bravo jabs his bat down and the ball trickles back onto the stumps. But the bails refuse to budge. Drama in Mumbai
good length and outside off, run down to short third man. Bravo chances a single. Mustafizur fumbles and they pinch an extra run via an overthrow
full-toss on middle stump, Bumrah isn't getting his lengths right. Bravo sizes it up and smites it over midwicket for back-to-back boundaries. Deejay Bravo is having CSK fans grooving to his tunes
Bumrah misses his yorker. Goes too full and outside off, Bravo collapses his back leg and lofts it over over the long-off boundary
Bravo uses his feet, meets a full-toss, and splices it over the bowler's head
shorter on middle as Bravo steps out and crunches a pull to the left of deep midwicket for another boundary. Mitch McC continues to leak runs in the death
yorker outside leg, jammed out to wide long-on. Bravo hares back for the second
full and veering into the pads, Bravo picks it up and launches it over the midwicket boundary. Not middled but enough to clear the man in the deep
very full on middle, Bravo gets underneath the length hoists it over the bowler's head with utter nonchalance. Shot
banged in short and homing in at the rib cage, Bravo hops and is cramped for room. He wears it on the body
back of a length and veering down the leg side, Wood picks it up and hits it straight into the lap of Mustafizur at long leg
bouncer on middle, Wood is beaten for pace as he misses the pull
Pandya ventures another slower ball and floats it down the leg side
back of a length on off, Bravo splices a pull over midwicket
short and wide outside off, Wood secures a single to third man
slower offcutter on off stump, Bravo checks his shot and pushes it back to the bowler
full and outside off, Bravo opens up his hips and scythes it flat and hard over extra cover. Hits the ad boards on the flush
slower bouncer, slanting away outside the off stump. Harbhajan can only ramp it straight down the throat of Bumrah at deep third man
Bravo makes room outside leg, and scythes it up and over extra cover. Beats sweeper to his right
full and angling across off, Harbhajan reaches out for the ball and slices it away past backward point. Mitch McC makes a royal mess of it at third man and lets the ball to the boundary
full cutter outside off, Bravo throws his bat at the ball and slices an outside edge to the left of short third man
Markande lobs it up outside off and gets it to break back in. Chahar does not spot the change-up. He has a leg-side slog and misses. Kishan swipes the bails off in a flash
Such a smooth swing from Bravo. Looped up full on middle, dances down the track and launches it over the bowler's head

Jadeja goes and with it CSK's hopes? Whippy cutter from Mustafiz, the line is wide of off, Jadeja gets more height as opposed to distance. He eventually toe-ends a catch to Suryakumar running in from long-off
Jadeja rides the bounce of this short ball outside off and cuts to deep point
overpitched and outside off, Jadeja stretches out and laces this half-volley to the right of the bowler and left of mid-off
tossed outside off, Jadhav steps down the track, meets the pitch, and hoists it over long-on
Jadeja darts down the track, dug in shorter on middle, splices a pull over midwicket
Jadhav ventures down the pitch, Pandya floats it wide outside off
lobbed up outside off and viciously breaks away outside off. Jadeja chases after this big-turning googly and is left overbalanced. The keeper whips the bails off but Jadeja's foot remained grounded

Markande catches Dhoni on the crease. Umpire Gaffney shoots down the appeal but Mumbai choose to review. This is pretty plumb. Another skiddy googly, full and breaks back in to beat the inside edge and hit the back pad in line with middle stump. Dhoni did not pick the variation. This is cannoning into middle stump. The tracker returns three reds. Umpire Gaffney reverses his decision and sends Dhoni back. Where will CSK go from here?
Dhoni forays down the track, takes a full-toss and clips to wide long-on
dropped short and wide outside off, Jadhav rocks back and slaps it to sweeper cover
tossed on off, Dhoni steps out and works a single to midwicket

Markande strikes with his third ball on IPL debut. Rayudu has a word with Jadhav and decides against a review. This is plumb. Flatter googly, breaks in, too full for the sweep. This would have crashed into middle stump
pretty full and outside off, tapped to point again. Markande begins with two dots

Caught Pandya bowled Pandya. Hardik tests Raina with a short ball on middle, the batsman backs away outside leg and flaps a pull to mid-on. Good overhead catch from Krunal. Raina has been bounced out again
Raina backs away outside leg, banged in short on middle, Raina slashes and does not connect
back of a length on middle, Rayudu moves away outside leg, creates swinging room and crashes it over point
on a length and outside off, Rayudu drives it on the up and creams it away to the cover boundary
full and outside off, Rayudu presses forward, opens the face and guides to backward point
Hardik provides Mumbai with the breakthrough. Slower knuckle ball at 120ks from Hardik. Watson does not pick the variation. He is early into his pick-up shot and skies it to Lewis at long leg
full and wide outside off, Watson reaches out for the ball and drives it all the way over extra cover for a flat six. Sublime timing. Shot of the day?
short on off, Watson rides it down to third man
full, wide of the crease, slanting in, Watson plays around his front pad and pushes to mid-on
pitched up and outside off, Rayudu presses forward, drives it on the up, and finds the gap at the covers
another slower cutter, 120.8ks, Watson does not pick the variation again. He aims a biiiig drive and misses
pitched up and angling across off stump, Watson stretches out and slices it up and over the covers
Rayudu dashes down the track, manufactures a half-volley, and smears it over the top of mid-off
back of a length and skidding in, Watson is cramped up as he inside-edges the ball beside his feet. Mitch McC swoops in and attacks the ball. Rayudu slides his bat in time
very full and slanting away outside off, Watson shoulders arms

pretty full on off, Hardik can't get under it. He hacks it off the inside half to deep midwicket. He collides with Bravo and collapses at the non-striker's end. So, Mumbai have to settle with a single

Wood can't nail his lengths but Krunal keeps nailing his shots. Dug short on middle, not short enough. Krunal launches a pull over the backward square leg boundary. Wood ends with 4-0-49-0 on IPL debut
banged in short and outside off, Krunal skies a pull over midwicket. The ball eludes Rayudu running in from the deep
Krunal slinks away outside leg, shorter on middle, bounces over the bat
Wood can't nail the yorker at all. Overpitched another one and watches Krunal thump him straight down the ground
slightly overpitched and outside off, Krunal gets underneath the length and drives it firmly between the bowler and mid-off inside the circle
wide of the crease, full-toss on middle, Pandya middles it straight to deep square leg
full cutter outside off, 95ks, Krunal swings early at this offcutter and misses
Krunal backs away outside leg and jabs a yorker through the covers. This was a fine ball from Wood: right in the blockhole. Krunal still manages to find the boundary. Make it 19 off the over
Krunal moves across off again, Wood sprays it down leg for a wide
Krunal moves across off, this is dug short on middle, Krunal adjusts and pulls it away fine of short fine leg
Krunal backs away outside leg and squeezes a single down to long-on
hip-high short ball on off stump, slower one, Krunal reads the variation and forces the pull over the midwicket boundary
full, shapes away and runs past the flashing blade of Krunal Pandya
overpitched and angling away outside off, Krunal leans into it and caresses a drive through the covers for a first-ball four
Tahir sets off on a celebratory run to marine drive. Topspinner, sliding away outside off, Kishan has a mighty slog at it and only sends a top-edge to short third man
dangled up outside off and spins away, Pandya does not meet the pitch and winds up inside-edging it behind square
wide of the crease, Wood hits a hard length, on off, jabbed to the covers off the back foot
wide of the crease, dug short and outside off, Pandya arches his back and ramps it over the vacant cordon. He loves playing this shot
140.2ks short ball aimed at the head, Hardik Pandya brings out a duck-pull. He looks away, ducks, and pulls it away fine past the keeper
short, wide, slapped to sweeper. Watson has given CSK some breathing space

Watson has bounced out Suryakumar Yadav. Harbhajan who caught the ball at deep square leg lets out a big roar and fiercely kicks the ball away. Chest-high short ball on off stump, rushes the pull and the top edge is held by Harbhajan in yellow
big dipper from Bravo but the line is wrong - on leg stump - paddled away to fine leg
Tahir fires it full and outside off, flat-batted straight down the ground. Raina swiftly moves to his left from long-off and gets behind the ball
Suryakumar Yadav backs away outside leg, Wood runs in hard, hits the pitch harder and finds extra bounce to zip past the bat
Kishan advances down the track, Wood responds with a bouncer, and forces the batsman to duck under it
Kishan ventures down the track, Harbhajan drags his length back, whipped away to deep midwicket
round-arm dart from Jadeja, Kishan exploits the pace and deftly runs it past Dhoni's left knee
Another classy shot from Suryakumar. Watson sprays a full ball onto the pads, Suryakumar picks it up and launches it over the midwicket boundary. He made it look as easy as eating a sandwich
good length and angling in at off, Suryakumar plays early and leading-edges it to the left of Watson

Watson has Rohit holing out to Rayudu running in from backward point. Good length and on off stump, Rohit eyes up the leg side. Instead, he loses his shape and top-edges it hiiiiiigh into the night sky. Rayudu runs in and just hangs on to this skier. Watson roars in delight. CSK mark their return with two early strikes
Re-set the radar, Mr. Watson. Floated very full and wide outside off, past the marker, off-side wide
Watson hits a hard length on off - neither driveable nor pullable - jabbed back to the bowler
Chahar continues to tease Rohit. Full outswinger, pitches on and around off and zips away past the bat

Chahar wins an lbw appeal from umpire Chris Gaffaney. Lewis challenges the on-field out decision. DRS makes an appearance in the IPL. Is this swinging past the leg stump? Nippy inswinger from Chahar, pitches on middle and leg and swerves in to ping the pad as Lewis falls over the leg-side flick. The tracker suggests it would go on to clip the outside of the leg stump. Umpire's call it is and Lewis bags a duck on IPL debut

Watson opens up Rohit but the outside edge does not carry Harbhajan at wide slip. Nice and full, angling in at off, which means Rohit has to play at it. The  ball straightens away and takes the outside edge
full and angling across off stump, Lewis lets it go in the channel
on a length and outside off, Chahar finds outswing again, Rohit dares to step out, he has a big whooosh at it  and misses
Chahar beats the outside edge right away. Nice and full, angling in, then nibbling away late outside off. Rohit has a skittish poke and the ball nearly shaves the outside edge
